sentences.zh: 曹沫者，魯人也，以勇力事魯莊公。

translations.literal: Cao Mo was Lu person, with bravery strength served Duke Zhuang of Lu.
translations.idiomatic: Cao Mo was a man of Lu who served Duke Zhuang of Lu with bravery and strength.

sentences.zh: 莊公好力。

translations.literal: Duke Zhuang liked strength.
translations.idiomatic: Duke Zhuang was fond of strength.

sentences.zh: 曹沫為魯將，與齊戰，三敗北。

translations.literal: Cao Mo was Lu general, with Qi fought, three times defeated retreated.
translations.idiomatic: Cao Mo was a general of Lu. He fought with Qi and was defeated three times, retreating each time.

sentences.zh: 魯莊公懼，乃獻遂邑之地以和。

translations.literal: Duke Zhuang of Lu feared, then offered Sui Yi territory to make peace.
translations.idiomatic: Duke Zhuang of Lu was afraid and offered the territory of Sui Yi to make peace.

sentences.zh: 猶復以為將。

translations.literal: Still again made him general.
translations.idiomatic: He still kept him as general.

translations.literal: Cao Mo was a man of Lu, served Lu Zhuang Gong with bravery and strength. Zhuang Gong delighted in strength. Cao Mo as Lu general, battled Qi, three times defeated retreated. Lu Zhuang Gong feared, thus offered Sui yi land to make peace. Still again made him general.

sentences.zh: 齊桓公許與魯會于柯而盟。

translations.literal: Duke Huan of Qi agreed with Lu to meet at Ke and form alliance.
translations.idiomatic: Duke Huan of Qi agreed to meet with Lu at Ke and form an alliance.

sentences.zh: 桓公與莊公既盟於壇上，曹沫執匕首劫齊桓公，桓公左右莫敢動，而問曰：「子將何欲？」

translations.literal: Duke Huan and Duke Zhuang had already formed alliance on altar, Cao Mo held dagger hijacked Duke Huan of Qi, Duke Huan attendants none dared move, asked: 'What do you want?'
translations.idiomatic: Duke Huan and Duke Zhuang had already formed their alliance on the altar when Cao Mo took a dagger and hijacked Duke Huan of Qi. Duke Huan's attendants dared not move. He asked: 'What do you want?'

sentences.zh: 曹沫曰：「齊彊魯弱，而大國侵魯亦甚矣。

translations.literal: Cao Mo said: 'Qi strong Lu weak, great state invading Lu too much.
translations.idiomatic: Cao Mo said: 'Qi is strong and Lu is weak, yet the great state has invaded Lu too severely.'

sentences.zh: 今魯城壞即壓齊境，君其圖之。」

translations.literal: Now Lu city breaks then presses Qi border, lord consider it.'
translations.idiomatic: Now if Lu's city walls break, they will press against Qi's borders. My lord, please consider this.'

sentences.zh: 桓公乃許盡歸魯之侵地。

translations.literal: Duke Huan then promised to return all Lu's invaded land.
translations.idiomatic: Duke Huan then promised to return all the land that had been invaded from Lu.

sentences.zh: 既已言，曹沫投其匕首，下壇，北面就群臣之位，顏色不變，辭令如故。

translations.literal: Having already spoken, Cao Mo threw his dagger, descended altar, faced north took position among ministers, color unchanged, rhetoric as before.
translations.idiomatic: Having spoken, Cao Mo threw down his dagger, descended the altar, faced north and took his position among the ministers. His color was unchanged, his rhetoric as before.

sentences.zh: 桓公怒，欲倍其約。

translations.literal: Duke Huan angry, wanted to break his promise.
translations.idiomatic: Duke Huan was angry and wanted to break his promise.

sentences.zh: 管仲曰：「不可。

translations.literal: Guan Zhong said: 'Cannot.'
translations.idiomatic: Guan Zhong said: 'That cannot be done.'

sentences.zh: 夫貪小利以自快，棄信於諸侯，失天下之援，不如與之。」

translations.literal: Greed small benefit to please self, abandon trust among lords, lose world's support, better give it to him.'
translations.idiomatic: To greedily take small benefits for self-satisfaction, abandon trust among the lords, and lose the world's support - it is better to give it to him.'

sentences.zh: 於是桓公乃遂割魯侵地，曹沫三戰所亡地盡復予魯。

translations.literal: Then Duke Huan then cut off Lu invaded land, Cao Mo three battles lost land all returned to Lu.
translations.idiomatic: Then Duke Huan cut off the land that had been invaded from Lu. All the land Cao Mo had lost in three battles was returned to Lu.

translations.literal: Qi Huan Gong permitted meet with Lu at Ke to ally. Huan Gong with Zhuang Gong having allied on altar, Cao Mo grasped dagger hostage Qi Huan Gong. Huan Gong attendants none dared move, asked: 'You will what desire?' Cao Mo said: 'Qi strong Lu weak, great state invade Lu also extreme. Now Lu city broken then presses Qi border, lord consider it.' Huan Gong thus permitted completely return Lu invaded land. Already spoken, Cao Mo threw his dagger, descended altar, north faced took ministers' position, complexion unchanged, words as before. Huan Gong angered, wished break agreement. Guan Zhong said: 'Cannot. Greed small benefit self-pleasure, abandon trust among feudal lords, lose world support, better give him.' Thus Huan Gong then cut Qi invaded land, Cao Mo three battles lost land completely restored to Lu.

sentences.zh: 其後百六十有七年而吳有專諸之事。

translations.literal: After this 167 years then Wu had Zhuan Zhu affair.
translations.idiomatic: 167 years after this, Wu had the affair of Zhuan Zhu.

translations.literal: After hundred sixty seven years then Wu had Zhuan Zhu affair.

sentences.zh: 專諸者，吳堂邑人也。

translations.literal: Zhuan Zhu was Wu Tang Yi person.
translations.idiomatic: Zhuan Zhu was a man of Tangyi in Wu.

sentences.zh: 伍子胥之亡楚而如吳也，知專諸之能。

translations.literal: Wu Zixu fled Chu went to Wu, knew Zhuan Zhu ability.
translations.idiomatic: When Wu Zixu fled Chu and went to Wu, he knew of Zhuan Zhu's abilities.

sentences.zh: 伍子胥既見吳王僚，說以伐楚之利。

translations.literal: Wu Zixu already saw Wu king Liao, persuaded with attacking Chu benefits.
translations.idiomatic: Wu Zixu had already seen King Liao of Wu and persuaded him with the benefits of attacking Chu.

sentences.zh: 吳公子光曰：「彼伍員父兄皆死於楚而員言伐楚，欲自為報私讎也，非能為吳。」

translations.literal: Wu prince Guang said: 'That Wu Yuan father brothers all died in Chu yet Yuan speaks attack Chu, wants self avenge private enmity, not able for Wu.'
translations.idiomatic: Prince Guang of Wu said: 'Wu Yuan's father and brothers all died in Chu, yet he speaks of attacking Chu. He wants to avenge his private enmities himself - he is not able to act for Wu.'

sentences.zh: 吳王乃止。

translations.literal: Wu king then stopped.
translations.idiomatic: The king of Wu then stopped.

sentences.zh: 伍子胥知公子光之欲殺吳王僚，乃曰：「彼光將有內志，未可說以外事。」

translations.literal: Wu Zixu knew prince Guang wanted kill Wu king Liao, said: 'That Guang will have internal ambitions, cannot persuade with external affairs.'
translations.idiomatic: Wu Zixu knew that Prince Guang wanted to kill King Liao of Wu. He said: 'That Guang will have internal ambitions. He cannot be persuaded with external affairs.'

sentences.zh: 乃進專諸於公子光。

translations.literal: Then introduced Zhuan Zhu to prince Guang.
translations.idiomatic: He then introduced Zhuan Zhu to Prince Guang.

translations.literal: Zhuan Zhu was Wu Tang yi person. Wu Zixu fled Chu went to Wu, knew Zhuan Zhu ability. Wu Zixu having seen Wu King Liao, persuaded attacking Chu benefit. Wu prince Guang said: 'That Wu Yuan father brothers all died in Chu yet Yuan speaks attack Chu, wishes self avenge private enmity, not can for Wu.' Wu king thus stopped. Wu Zixu knew Prince Guang desired kill Wu King Liao, thus said: 'That Guang will have inner ambition, cannot persuade with outer affairs.' Thus advanced Zhuan Zhu to Prince Guang.

sentences.zh: 光之父曰吳王諸樊。

translations.literal: Guang's father called Wu king Zhu Fan.
translations.idiomatic: Guang's father was called King Zhufan of Wu.

sentences.zh: 諸樊弟三人：次曰餘祭，次曰夷眛，次曰季子札。

translations.literal: Zhu Fan younger brothers three: next called Yu Ji, next called Yi Mei, next called Ji Zi Zha.
translations.idiomatic: Zhufan had three younger brothers: the next was called Yuji, then Yimei, then Jizi Zha.

sentences.zh: 諸樊知季子札賢而不立太子，以次傳三弟，欲卒致國于季子札。

translations.literal: Zhu Fan knew Ji Zi Zha worthy not established crown prince, by order transmitted three younger brothers, wanted finally give country to Ji Zi Zha.
translations.idiomatic: Zhufan knew Jizi Zha was worthy but did not establish him as crown prince. He transmitted the throne in order to his three younger brothers, wanting to finally give the country to Jizi Zha.

sentences.zh: 諸樊既死，傳餘祭。

translations.literal: Zhu Fan already died, transmitted Yu Ji.
translations.idiomatic: After Zhufan died, he transmitted the throne to Yuji.

sentences.zh: 餘祭死，傳夷眛。

translations.literal: Yu Ji died, transmitted Yi Mei.
translations.idiomatic: After Yuji died, he transmitted to Yimei.

sentences.zh: 夷眛死，當傳季子札；

translations.literal: Yi Mei died, should transmit Ji Zi Zha;
translations.idiomatic: After Yimei died, it should have been transmitted to Jizi Zha;

sentences.zh: 季子札逃不肯立，吳人乃立夷眛之子僚為王。

translations.literal: Ji Zi Zha fled not willing establish, Wu people then established Yi Mei son Liao as king.
translations.idiomatic: Jizi Zha fled and refused to be established. The Wu people then established Yimei's son, Liao, as king.

sentences.zh: 公子光曰：「使以兄弟次邪，季子當立；

translations.literal: Prince Guang said: 'If by brothers order, Ji Zi should establish;
translations.idiomatic: Prince Guang said: 'If by order of brothers, Jizi should be established;'

sentences.zh: 必以子乎，則光真適嗣，當立。」

translations.literal: Must by son, then Guang true proper heir, should establish.'
translations.idiomatic: If it must be by sons, then I, Guang, am the true proper heir and should be established.'

sentences.zh: 故嘗陰養謀臣以求立。

translations.literal: Therefore often secretly nurtured plotting ministers to seek establishment.
translations.idiomatic: Therefore he often secretly nurtured plotting ministers to seek establishment.

translations.literal: Guang father called Wu King Zhu Fan. Zhu Fan younger brothers three: next called Yu Ji, next called Yi Mei, next called Ji Zi Zha. Zhu Fan knew Ji Zi Zha worthy not established crown prince, by order passed three younger brothers, wished finally give state to Ji Zi Zha. Zhu Fan having died, passed Yu Ji. Yu Ji died, passed Yi Mei. Yi Mei died, should pass Ji Zi Zha; Ji Zi Zha fled would not establish, Wu people thus established Yi Mei son Liao as king. Prince Guang said: 'If by brothers order, Ji Zi should establish; Must by son, then Guang true proper heir, should establish.' Thus often secretly nurtured plot ministers to seek establishment.

sentences.zh: 光既得專諸，善客待之。

translations.literal: Guang already got Zhuan Zhu, treated well as guest.
translations.idiomatic: Guang, having obtained Zhuan Zhu, treated him well as a guest.

sentences.zh: 九年而楚平王死。

translations.literal: Nine years and Chu Ping Wang died.
translations.idiomatic: After nine years, King Ping of Chu died.

sentences.zh: 春，吳王僚欲因楚喪，使其二弟公子蓋餘、屬庸將兵圍楚之灊；

translations.literal: Spring, Wu king Liao wanted take advantage Chu mourning, make his two younger brothers prince Gai Yu, Zhu Yong lead troops surround Chu Qian;
translations.idiomatic: In spring, King Liao of Wu wanted to take advantage of Chu's mourning. He had his two younger brothers, Prince Gaiyu and Zhuyong, lead troops to surround Qian of Chu;

sentences.zh: 使延陵季子於晉，以觀諸侯之變。

translations.literal: Made Yanling Ji Zi go to Jin, to observe lords changes.
translations.idiomatic: He sent Jizi of Yanling to Jin to observe the changes among the lords.

sentences.zh: 楚發兵絕吳將蓋餘、屬庸路，吳兵不得還。

translations.literal: Chu sent troops cut off Wu generals Gai Yu, Zhu Yong road, Wu troops could not return.
translations.idiomatic: Chu sent troops to cut off the road of the Wu generals Gaiyu and Zhuyong. The Wu troops could not return.

sentences.zh: 於是公子光謂專諸曰：「此時不可失，不求何獲！

translations.literal: Then prince Guang told Zhuan Zhu said: 'This time cannot lose, not seek what gain!
translations.idiomatic: Then Prince Guang told Zhuan Zhu: 'This opportunity cannot be lost! If you don't seek, what will you gain?'

sentences.zh: 且光真王嗣，當立，季子雖來，不吾廢也。」

translations.literal: Moreover Guang true king heir, should establish, Ji Zi though come, not abolish me.'
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, I, Guang, am the true kingly heir and should be established. Even if Jizi comes, he will not abolish me.'

sentences.zh: 專諸曰：「王僚可殺也。

translations.literal: Zhuan Zhu said: 'King Liao can kill.
translations.idiomatic: Zhuan Zhu said: 'King Liao can be killed.'

sentences.zh: 母老子弱，而兩弟將兵伐楚，楚絕其後。

translations.literal: Mother old son weak, two younger brothers leading troops attack Chu, Chu cuts their rear.
translations.idiomatic: His mother is old and his son weak, while his two younger brothers are leading troops to attack Chu, and Chu has cut off their rear.

sentences.zh: 方今吳外困於楚，而內空無骨鯁之臣，是無如我何。」

translations.literal: Now Wu externally troubled by Chu, internally empty no backbone ministers, this nothing can do to me.'
translations.idiomatic: Now Wu is externally troubled by Chu and internally empty of backbone ministers. This is nothing that can be done to me.'

sentences.zh: 公子光頓首曰：「光之身，子之身也。」

translations.literal: Prince Guang kowtowed said: 'Guang's body, your body.'
translations.idiomatic: Prince Guang kowtowed and said: 'My body is your body.'

translations.literal: Guang having obtained Zhuan Zhu, well treated as guest. Nine years then Chu Ping Wang died. Spring, Wu King Liao wished take Chu mourning, made his two younger brothers Prince Gai Yu, Zhu Yong lead troops surround Chu Qian; Sent Yanling Ji Zi to Jin, to observe feudal lords changes. Chu sent troops cut Wu generals Gai Yu, Zhu Yong road, Wu troops could not return. Thus Prince Guang told Zhuan Zhu: 'This time cannot lose, not seek what obtain! Moreover Guang true king heir, should establish, Ji Zi though come, not abolish me.' Zhuan Zhu said: 'King Liao can kill. Mother old son weak, two younger brothers lead troops attack Chu, Chu cut their rear. Now Wu externally distressed by Chu, internally empty without backbone ministers, is cannot do anything to me.' Prince Guang bowed head: 'Guang body, your body.'

sentences.zh: 四月丙子，光伏甲士於窟室中，而具酒請王僚。

translations.literal: Fourth month Bingzi, Guang hid armored soldiers in cave room, prepared wine invited king Liao.
translations.idiomatic: On the bingzi day of the fourth month, Guang hid armored soldiers in a cave room and prepared wine to invite King Liao.

sentences.zh: 王僚使兵陳自宮至光之家，門戶階陛左右，皆王僚之親戚也。

translations.literal: King Liao had troops arrayed from palace to Guang's house, gates doors stairs left right, all King Liao's relatives.
translations.idiomatic: King Liao had troops arrayed from his palace to Guang's house. The gates, doors, stairs, and left and right were all King Liao's relatives.

sentences.zh: 夾立侍，皆持長鈹。

translations.literal: Standing in rows serving, all held long spears.
translations.idiomatic: They stood in rows serving, all holding long spears.

sentences.zh: 酒既酣，公子光詳為足疾，入窟室中，使專諸置匕首魚炙之腹中而進之。

translations.literal: Wine already plentiful, prince Guang pretended foot illness, entered cave room, made Zhuan Zhu place dagger in roasted fish belly and advance it.
translations.idiomatic: When the wine was plentiful, Prince Guang pretended to have a foot ailment and entered the cave room. He had Zhuan Zhu place the dagger in the belly of a roasted fish and advance it.

sentences.zh: 既至王前，專諸擘魚，因以匕首刺王僚，王僚立死。

translations.literal: Already to king front, Zhuan Zhu split fish, because with dagger stabbed king Liao, king Liao stood died.
translations.idiomatic: When it reached the king, Zhuan Zhu split open the fish and stabbed King Liao with the dagger. King Liao died standing.

sentences.zh: 左右亦殺專諸，王人擾亂。

translations.literal: Left right also killed Zhuan Zhu, king people disturbed chaotic.
translations.idiomatic: The attendants on the left and right also killed Zhuan Zhu. The king's people were disturbed and chaotic.

sentences.zh: 公子光出其伏甲以攻王僚之徒，盡滅之，遂自立為王，是為闔閭。

translations.literal: Prince Guang sent out his hidden armored troops to attack king Liao's followers, completely exterminated them, then established himself as king, this He Lü.
translations.idiomatic: Prince Guang sent out his hidden armored troops to attack King Liao's followers and completely exterminated them. He then established himself as king. This was Helü.

sentences.zh: 闔閭乃封專諸之子以為上卿。

translations.literal: He Lü then enfeoffed Zhuan Zhu's son as upper minister.
translations.idiomatic: Helü then enfeoffed Zhuan Zhu's son as an upper minister.

translations.literal: Fourth month bing zi, Guang hid armored soldiers in cave chamber, prepared wine invited King Liao. King Liao made troops array from palace to Guang home, doorways stairs left right, all King Liao relatives. Flanking standing attendants, all held long spears. Wine already flowing, Prince Guang feigned foot illness, entered cave chamber, made Zhuan Zhu place dagger in fish roast belly advanced it. Having reached king before, Zhuan Zhu split fish, thus with dagger stabbed King Liao, King Liao immediately died. Attendants also killed Zhuan Zhu, king people chaotic. Prince Guang brought out his hidden armored troops to attack King Liao's followers, completely exterminated them, thus self-established as king, this was Helü. Helü then enfeoffed Zhuan Zhu's son as upper minister.

sentences.zh: 其後七十餘年而晉有豫讓之事。

translations.literal: After seventy plus years then Jin had Yu Rang affair.
translations.idiomatic: Seventy years later, Jin had the affair of Yu Rang.

translations.literal: After seventy plus years then Jin had Yu Rang affair.

sentences.zh: 豫讓者，晉人也，故嘗事范氏及中行氏，而無所知名。

translations.literal: Yu Rang was Jin person, formerly served Fan clan and Zhonghang clan, not known anywhere.
translations.idiomatic: Yu Rang was a man of Jin. He had formerly served the Fan clan and the Zhonghang clan but was not known anywhere.

sentences.zh: 去而事智伯，智伯甚尊寵之。

translations.literal: Left and served Zhi Bo, Zhi Bo very honored favored him.
translations.idiomatic: He left and served Zhi Bo. Zhi Bo greatly honored and favored him.

sentences.zh: 及智伯伐趙襄子，趙襄子與韓、魏合謀滅智伯，滅智伯之後而三分其地。

translations.literal: When Zhi Bo attacked Zhao Xiangzi, Zhao Xiangzi with Han, Wei together plotted exterminate Zhi Bo, exterminated Zhi Bo after divided his land three ways.
translations.idiomatic: When Zhi Bo attacked Zhao Xiangzi, Zhao Xiangzi plotted together with Han and Wei to exterminate Zhi Bo. After exterminating Zhi Bo, they divided his land into three parts.

sentences.zh: 趙襄子最怨智伯，漆其頭以為飲器。

translations.literal: Zhao Xiangzi most resented Zhi Bo, lacquered his head to make drinking vessel.
translations.idiomatic: Zhao Xiangzi most resented Zhi Bo and lacquered his head to make a drinking vessel.

sentences.zh: 豫讓遁逃山中，曰：「嗟乎！

translations.literal: Yu Rang fled escaped mountain, said: 'Alas!
translations.idiomatic: Yu Rang fled and escaped into the mountains, saying: 'Alas!'

sentences.zh: 士為知己者死，女為說己者容。

translations.literal: Men for those who know self die, women for those who please self adorn.
translations.idiomatic: A man dies for one who knows him; a woman adorns herself for one who pleases her.

sentences.zh: 今智伯知我，我必為報讎而死，以報智伯，則吾魂魄不愧矣。」

translations.literal: Now Zhi Bo knows me, I must avenge enmity die, to repay Zhi Bo, then my soul spirit not ashamed.'
translations.idiomatic: Now Zhi Bo knows me. I must die avenging my enmity to repay Zhi Bo. Then my soul and spirit will not be ashamed.'

sentences.zh: 乃變名姓為刑人，入宮涂廁，中挾匕首，欲以刺襄子。

translations.literal: Then changed name surname as criminal, entered palace smear toilets, inside hid dagger, wanted stab Xiangzi.
translations.idiomatic: He then changed his name and surname to become a criminal, entered the palace to smear toilets, hid a dagger inside, and wanted to stab Xiangzi.

sentences.zh: 襄子如廁，心動，執問涂廁之刑人，則豫讓，內持刀兵，曰：「欲為智伯報仇！」

translations.literal: Xiangzi went toilet, heart moved, seized questioned smear toilet criminal, then Yu Rang, inside held blade weapon, said: 'Want for Zhi Bo avenge enmity!'
translations.idiomatic: Xiangzi went to the toilet. His heart was moved. He seized and questioned the criminal smearing the toilet. It was Yu Rang, holding a blade weapon inside, who said: 'I want to avenge Zhi Bo!'

sentences.zh: 左右欲誅之。

translations.literal: Left right wanted execute him.
translations.idiomatic: The attendants on the left and right wanted to execute him.

sentences.zh: 襄子曰：「彼義人也，吾謹避之耳。

translations.literal: Xiangzi said: 'He is righteous person, I carefully avoid him only.
translations.idiomatic: Xiangzi said: 'He is a righteous person. I will carefully avoid him.'

sentences.zh: 且智伯亡無後，而其臣欲為報仇，此天下之賢人也。」

translations.literal: Moreover Zhi Bo died without descendants, yet his minister wants avenge enmity, this world's worthy person.'
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, Zhi Bo died without descendants, yet his minister wants to avenge his enmity. This is a worthy person of the world.'

sentences.zh: 卒醳去之。

translations.literal: Finally forgave released him.
translations.idiomatic: Finally he forgave and released him.

translations.literal: Yu Rang was Jin person, formerly served Fan clan and Zhonghang clan, without known reputation. Left served Zhi Bo, Zhi Bo much honored favored him. When Zhi Bo attacked Zhao Xiangzi, Zhao Xiangzi with Han, Wei united plotted exterminate Zhi Bo, exterminated Zhi Bo after divided his land three ways. Zhao Xiangzi most resented Zhi Bo, lacquered his head to make drinking vessel. Yu Rang fled hid in mountains, said: 'Alas! Scholar dies for one who knows him, woman adorns for one who pleases her. Now Zhi Bo knows me, I must avenge enmity die, to repay Zhi Bo, then my soul not ashamed.' Thus changed name surname became criminal, entered palace smeared toilets, middle hid dagger, wished stab Xiangzi. Xiangzi went to toilet, heart moved, seized questioned toilet smearing criminal, was Yu Rang, inside held blade weapons, said: 'Wish avenge Zhi Bo!' Attendants wished execute him. Xiangzi said: 'He righteous person, I carefully avoid him. Moreover Zhi Bo died without descendants, his minister wishes avenge enmity, this world's worthy person.' Ultimately released departed him.

sentences.zh: 居頃之，豫讓又漆身為厲，吞炭為啞，使形狀不可知，行乞於市。

translations.literal: Dwelt period, Yu Rang again lacquered body as leper, swallowed charcoal as mute, made appearance not recognizable, begged in market.
translations.idiomatic: After some time, Yu Rang again lacquered his body to appear as a leper, swallowed charcoal to make himself mute, made his appearance unrecognizable, and begged in the market.

sentences.zh: 其妻不識也。

translations.literal: His wife not recognize him.
translations.idiomatic: His wife did not recognize him.

sentences.zh: 行見其友，其友識之，曰：「汝非豫讓邪？」

translations.literal: Walking saw his friend, his friend recognized him, said: 'You not Yu Rang?'
translations.idiomatic: While walking, he saw his friend. His friend recognized him and said: 'Are you not Yu Rang?'

sentences.zh: 曰：「我是也。」

translations.literal: Said: 'I am.'
translations.idiomatic: He said: 'I am.'

sentences.zh: 其友為泣曰：「以子之才，委質而臣事襄子，襄子必近幸子。

translations.literal: His friend wept said: 'With your talent, submit serve Xiangzi, Xiangzi must approach favor you.
translations.idiomatic: His friend wept and said: 'With your talent, submit and serve Xiangzi. Xiangzi will certainly approach and favor you.'

sentences.zh: 近幸子，乃為所欲，顧不易邪？

translations.literal: Approach favor you, then can do what desired, moreover not easy?
translations.idiomatic: Approaching and favoring you, you can then do what you desire. Moreover, is this not easy?'

sentences.zh: 何乃殘身苦形，欲以求報襄子，不亦難乎！」

translations.literal: Why destroy body bitter form, want seek avenge Xiangzi, not difficult!'
translations.idiomatic: Why destroy your body and make your form bitter, wanting to seek vengeance on Xiangzi? Is this not difficult!'

sentences.zh: 豫讓曰：「既已委質臣事人，而求殺之，是懷二心以事其君也。

translations.literal: Yu Rang said: 'Already submit serve person, yet seek kill him, this serve lord with two hearts.
translations.idiomatic: Yu Rang said: 'Having already submitted and served a person, yet seeking to kill him - this is serving one's lord with two hearts.'

sentences.zh: 且吾所為者極難耳！

translations.literal: Moreover what I do is extremely difficult!'
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, what I am doing is extremely difficult!'

sentences.zh: 然所以為此者，將以愧天下後世之為人臣懷二心以事其君者也。」

translations.literal: Yet why do this, will shame world later generations who as ministers serve lord with two hearts.'
translations.idiomatic: Yet why I do this is to shame the people of later generations who, as ministers, serve their lords with two hearts.'

translations.literal: Dwelt moment, Yu Rang again lacquered body became leper, swallowed charcoal became mute, made appearance unrecognizable, begged in market. His wife not recognized him. Walking saw his friend, friend recognized him, said: 'You not Yu Rang?' Said: 'I am.' Friend wept for him: 'With your talent, submit serve Xiangzi, Xiangzi must approach favor you. Approach favor you, then accomplish what desired, moreover not easy? Why thus harm body bitter form, wish seek avenge Xiangzi, not difficult!' Yu Rang said: 'Already submitted served person, yet seek kill him, is harbor two hearts serve lord. Moreover what I do extremely difficult! Yet reason do this, will shame world later generations ministers harbor two hearts serve lord.'

sentences.zh: 既去，頃之，襄子當出，豫讓伏於所當過之橋下。

translations.literal: Already gone, period, Xiangzi should go out, Yu Rang hid under bridge he should pass.
translations.idiomatic: Having gone, after a while, Xiangzi was about to go out. Yu Rang hid under the bridge he was to pass.

sentences.zh: 襄子至橋，馬驚，襄子曰：「此必是豫讓也。」

translations.literal: Xiangzi to bridge, horse startled, Xiangzi said: 'This must Yu Rang.'
translations.idiomatic: Xiangzi reached the bridge. His horse was startled. Xiangzi said: 'This must be Yu Rang.'

sentences.zh: 使人問之，果豫讓也。

translations.literal: Made people ask, indeed Yu Rang.
translations.idiomatic: He had people ask. It was indeed Yu Rang.

sentences.zh: 於是襄子乃數豫讓曰：「子不嘗事范、中行氏乎？

translations.literal: Then Xiangzi reproached Yu Rang said: 'You not once serve Fan, Zhonghang clans?
translations.idiomatic: Then Xiangzi reproached Yu Rang, saying: 'Did you not once serve the Fan and Zhonghang clans?'

sentences.zh: 智伯盡滅之，而子不為報讎，而反委質臣於智伯。

translations.literal: Zhi Bo completely exterminated them, yet you not avenge enmity, instead submitted minister to Zhi Bo.
translations.idiomatic: Zhi Bo completely exterminated them, yet you did not avenge their enmity. Instead, you submitted and became a minister to Zhi Bo.'

sentences.zh: 智伯亦已死矣，而子獨何以為之報讎之深也？」

translations.literal: Zhi Bo also already died, yet you alone why avenge enmity so deep?'
translations.idiomatic: Zhi Bo has also already died. Why do you alone avenge his enmity so deeply?'

sentences.zh: 豫讓曰：「臣事范、中行氏，范、中行氏皆眾人遇我，我故眾人報之。

translations.literal: Yu Rang said: 'Minister served Fan, Zhonghang clans, Fan, Zhonghang clans all treated me as common person, I therefore common person repay them.
translations.idiomatic: Yu Rang said: 'I served the Fan and Zhonghang clans. The Fan and Zhonghang clans all treated me as a common person, so I repaid them as a common person.'

sentences.zh: 至於智伯，國士遇我，我故國士報之。」

translations.literal: As for Zhi Bo, treated me as state knight, I therefore state knight repay him.'
translations.idiomatic: As for Zhi Bo, he treated me as a knight of the state, so I repay him as a knight of the state.'

sentences.zh: 襄子喟然嘆息而泣曰：「嗟乎豫子！

translations.literal: Xiangzi sighed breathed wept said: 'Alas Yu Rang!
translations.idiomatic: Xiangzi sighed deeply and wept, saying: 'Alas, Yu Rang!'

sentences.zh: 子之為智伯，名既成矣，而寡人赦子，亦已足矣。

translations.literal: You for Zhi Bo, name already achieved, yet I pardon you, also already sufficient.
translations.idiomatic: Your reputation for Zhi Bo is already achieved. Yet I pardoned you - that is also already sufficient.'

sentences.zh: 子其自為計，寡人不復釋子！」

translations.literal: You yourself plan, I not again release you!'
translations.idiomatic: You make your own plans. I will not release you again!'

sentences.zh: 使兵圍之。

translations.literal: Made troops surround him.
translations.idiomatic: He had troops surround him.

sentences.zh: 豫讓曰：「臣聞明主不掩人之美，而忠臣有死名之義。

translations.literal: Yu Rang said: 'Minister heard enlightened lord not cover person's beauty, loyal minister have die with fame righteousness.
translations.idiomatic: Yu Rang said: 'I have heard that enlightened lords do not cover a person's beauty, and loyal ministers have the righteousness of dying with fame.'

sentences.zh: 前君已寬赦臣，天下莫不稱君之賢。

translations.literal: Former lord already generously pardoned minister, world none not call lord's worthiness.
translations.idiomatic: The former lord has already generously pardoned me. The world none do not call the lord's worthiness.'

sentences.zh: 今日之事，臣固伏誅，然願請君之衣而擊之，焉以致報讎之意，則雖死不恨。

translations.literal: Today's matter, minister indeed submit to execution, yet wish request lord's robe to strike it, thus achieve avenge enmity intention, then though die not regret.
translations.idiomatic: Today's matter - I, minister, indeed submit to execution. Yet I wish to request my lord's robe to strike it, thus achieving my intention to avenge enmity. Then though I die, I will not regret.'

sentences.zh: 非所敢望也，敢布腹心！」

translations.literal: Not what dare hope, dare lay out innermost feelings!'
translations.idiomatic: It is not what I dare hope for, but I dare to lay out my innermost feelings!'

sentences.zh: 於是襄子大義之，乃使使持衣與豫讓。

translations.literal: Then Xiangzi greatly valued righteousness, then made envoy hold robe give Yu Rang.
translations.idiomatic: Then Xiangzi greatly valued his righteousness and had an envoy hold the robe to give to Yu Rang.

sentences.zh: 豫讓拔劍三躍而擊之，曰：「吾可以下報智伯矣！」

translations.literal: Yu Rang drew sword three leaps struck it, said: 'I can below repay Zhi Bo!'
translations.idiomatic: Yu Rang drew his sword, leaped three times and struck it, saying: 'I can repay Zhi Bo from below!'

sentences.zh: 遂伏劍自殺。

translations.literal: Then fell on sword self killed.
translations.idiomatic: He then fell upon his sword and killed himself.

sentences.zh: 死之日，趙國志士聞之，皆為涕泣。

translations.literal: Died day, Zhao country worthy scholars heard, all wept for him.
translations.idiomatic: On the day he died, the worthy scholars of Zhao heard of it and all wept for him.

translations.literal: Having left, moment, Xiangzi when exit, Yu Rang hid at bridge he must pass. Xiangzi reached bridge, horse startled, Xiangzi said: 'This must Yu Rang.' Made people question, indeed Yu Rang. Thus Xiangzi numbered Yu Rang: 'You not formerly served Fan, Zhonghang clans? Zhi Bo completely exterminated them, yet you not avenge enmity, instead submitted ministered Zhi Bo. Zhi Bo also died, yet you alone why avenge so deep?' Yu Rang said: 'Minister served Fan, Zhonghang clans, Fan, Zhonghang clans all common people treated me, I thus common people repay. As for Zhi Bo, state knight treated me, I thus state knight repay.' Xiangzi sighed deeply wept: 'Alas Yu child! You for Zhi Bo, name already completed, my pardon you also sufficient. You self-plan, I no longer release you!' Made troops surround him. Yu Rang said: 'I heard enlightened lord not conceal others' beauty, loyal minister has die for fame righteousness. Former lord already generously pardoned minister, world none not praise lord's worthiness. Today matter, minister certainly submit to execution, yet wish request lord's robe strike it, thus realize avenge intention, then though die not regret. Not dare hope, dare bare heartfelt!' Thus Xiangzi greatly considered righteous, made envoy hold robe give Yu Rang. Yu Rang drew sword three leaps struck it, said: 'I can below repay Zhi Bo!' Thus fell sword suicide. Died day, Zhao state righteous scholars heard, all wept for him.

sentences.zh: 其後四十餘年而軹有聶政之事。

translations.literal: After forty plus years then Zhi had Nie Zheng affair.
translations.idiomatic: Forty years later, Zhi had the affair of Nie Zheng.

translations.literal: After forty plus years then Zhi had Nie Zheng affair.

sentences.zh: 聶政者，軹深井里人也。

translations.literal: Nie Zheng was Zhi deep well alley person.
translations.idiomatic: Nie Zheng was a man of the Deep Well Alley in Zhi.

sentences.zh: 殺人避仇，與母、姊如齊，以屠為事。

translations.literal: Killed person avoided enmity, with mother, sister went to Qi, took butchering as occupation.
translations.idiomatic: He killed a person to avoid enmity and went to Qi with his mother and sister, taking butchering as his occupation.

translations.literal: Nie Zheng was Zhi Shenjing li person. Killed person avoided enmity, with mother, sister went to Qi, took butchering as occupation.

sentences.zh: 久之，濮陽嚴仲子事韓哀侯，與韓相俠累有卻。

translations.literal: Long time, Puyang Yan Zhongzi served Han Ai Hou, with Han prime minister Xia Lei had grudge.
translations.idiomatic: After a long time, Yan Zhongzi of Puyang served King Ai of Han and had a grudge with the Han prime minister Xia Lei.

sentences.zh: 嚴仲子恐誅，亡去，游求人可以報俠累者。

translations.literal: Yan Zhongzi feared execution, fled gone, wandered sought person can avenge Xia Lei.
translations.idiomatic: Yan Zhongzi feared execution, fled, and wandered seeking someone who could avenge Xia Lei.

sentences.zh: 至齊，齊人或言聶政勇敢士也，避仇隱於屠者之閒。

translations.literal: To Qi, Qi people some said Nie Zheng brave worthy, avoided enmity hid among butchers.
translations.idiomatic: He came to Qi. Some Qi people said Nie Zheng was a brave and worthy man who avoided enmity and hid among the butchers.

sentences.zh: 嚴仲子至門請，數反，然後具酒自暢聶政母前。

translations.literal: Yan Zhongzi to door requested, several times returned, then prepared wine self poured before Nie Zheng mother.
translations.idiomatic: Yan Zhongzi went to the door and requested, returning several times. Then he prepared wine and poured it himself before Nie Zheng's mother.

sentences.zh: 酒酣，嚴仲子奉黃金百溢，前為聶政母壽。

translations.literal: Wine plentiful, Yan Zhongzi offered yellow gold hundred yi, before toasted Nie Zheng mother.
translations.idiomatic: When the wine was plentiful, Yan Zhongzi offered a hundred yi of yellow gold and toasted Nie Zheng's mother before him.

sentences.zh: 聶政驚怪其厚，固謝嚴仲子。

translations.literal: Nie Zheng startled strange his thickness, firmly declined Yan Zhongzi.
translations.idiomatic: Nie Zheng was startled and thought it strange that it was so generous. He firmly declined Yan Zhongzi.

sentences.zh: 嚴仲子固進，而聶政謝曰：「臣幸有老母，家貧，客游以為狗屠，可以旦夕得甘毳以養親。

translations.literal: Yan Zhongzi firmly advanced, Nie Zheng declined said: 'Minister fortunately has old mother, family poor, guest travel as dog butcher, can morning evening get sweet broth to nourish parents.
translations.idiomatic: Yan Zhongzi firmly pressed forward, while Nie Zheng declined, saying: 'I am fortunate to have an old mother. My family is poor. I travel as a guest and work as a dog butcher, able to obtain sweet broth morning and evening to nourish my parents.'

sentences.zh: 親供養備，不敢當仲子之賜。」

translations.literal: Parents nourishment complete, dare not accept Zhongzi gift.'
translations.idiomatic: My parents' nourishment is complete. I dare not accept Master Zhongzi's gift.'

sentences.zh: 嚴仲子辟人，因為聶政言曰：「臣有仇，而行游諸侯眾矣；

translations.literal: Yan Zhongzi dismissed people, because Nie Zheng spoke said: 'Minister has enmity, yet traveled wandered lords many;
translations.idiomatic: Yan Zhongzi dismissed the people and spoke to Nie Zheng, saying: 'I have an enemy, and I have traveled and wandered among many lords;'

sentences.zh: 然至齊，竊聞足下義甚高，故進百金者，將用為大人麤糲之費，得以交足下之驩，豈敢以有求望邪！」

translations.literal: Yet to Qi, secretly heard your honor very high, therefore advanced hundred gold, will use as adult coarse fine expenses, can obtain to make friends your happiness, how dare with having requests hope!'
translations.idiomatic: yet when I came to Qi, I secretly heard that your honor is very high. Therefore I presented a hundred pieces of gold, intending to use it for your coarse and fine expenses, so I could obtain the happiness of making friends with you. How dare I hope for anything in return!'

sentences.zh: 聶政曰：「臣所以降志辱身居市井屠者，徒幸以養老母；

translations.literal: Nie Zheng said: 'Minister why lower ambition humiliate body dwell market butcher, only fortunately to nourish old mother;
translations.idiomatic: Nie Zheng said: 'The reason I lower my ambitions and humiliate my body by dwelling in the market as a butcher is only to fortunately nourish my old mother;'

sentences.zh: 老母在，政身未敢以許人也。」

translations.literal: Old mother present, Zheng body not dare to promise person.'
translations.idiomatic: while my old mother is present, my body does not dare to promise itself to anyone.'

sentences.zh: 嚴仲子固讓，聶政竟不肯受也。

translations.literal: Yan Zhongzi firmly urged, Nie Zheng finally not willing receive.
translations.idiomatic: Yan Zhongzi firmly urged him, but Nie Zheng ultimately refused to accept.

sentences.zh: 然嚴仲子卒備賓主之禮而去。

translations.literal: Yet Yan Zhongzi finally prepared host guest ritual and left.
translations.idiomatic: Yet Yan Zhongzi finally prepared the rituals of host and guest and left.

translations.literal: Long time, Puyang Yan Zhongzi served Han Ai Hou, with Han minister Xia Lei had grudge. Yan Zhongzi feared execution, fled departed, traveled sought person can avenge Xia Lei. Reached Qi, Qi people some spoke Nie Zheng brave warrior, avoided enmity hid among butchers. Yan Zhongzi reached door requested, several times returned, then prepared wine self-toasted before Nie Zheng mother. Wine flowing, Yan Zhongzi offered yellow gold hundred yi, presented Nie Zheng mother longevity. Nie Zheng startled strange his thickness, firmly declined Yan Zhongzi. Yan Zhongzi firmly advanced, Nie Zheng declined said: 'Minister fortunately have aged mother, family poor, guest travel as dog butcher, can morning evening obtain sweet broth nourish parents. Parents nourishment complete, dare not accept Zhongzi's gift.' Yan Zhongzi dismissed people, thus spoke Nie Zheng: 'Minister have enmity, traveled feudal lords many; Yet reached Qi, secretly heard your righteousness very high, thus advanced hundred jin gold, will use as adult coarse food expense, able befriend your joy, how dare have request expectation!' Nie Zheng said: 'Minister reason lower ambition humble body dwell market butcher, merely fortunately nourish aged mother; Aged mother in, Zheng body not dare promise others.' Yan Zhongzi firmly urged, Nie Zheng ultimately would not accept. Yet Yan Zhongzi completed host guest ritual departed.

sentences.zh: 久之，聶政母死。

translations.literal: Long time, Nie Zheng mother died.
translations.idiomatic: After a long time, Nie Zheng's mother died.

sentences.zh: 既已葬，除服，聶政曰：「嗟乎！

translations.literal: Already buried, removed mourning, Nie Zheng said: 'Alas!
translations.idiomatic: After she was buried and the mourning period removed, Nie Zheng said: 'Alas!'

sentences.zh: 政乃市井之人，鼓刀以屠；

translations.literal: Zheng is market person, beats knife to butcher;
translations.idiomatic: I, Zheng, am a person of the market, beating my knife to butcher meat;

sentences.zh: 而嚴仲子乃諸侯之卿相也，不遠千里，枉車騎而交臣。

translations.literal: Yet Yan Zhongzi is lords minister chancellor, not far thousand li, bent chariot horse to make friends minister.
translations.idiomatic: yet Yan Zhongzi is a minister and chancellor of the lords. He did not consider a thousand li too far, bending his chariot and horses to make friends with me.'

sentences.zh: 臣之所以待之，至淺鮮矣，未有大功可以稱者，而嚴仲子奉百金為親壽，我雖不受，然是者徒深知政也。

translations.literal: Minister what treat him, to shallow few, not have great merit can name, yet Yan Zhongzi offered hundred gold to toast parents, I though not receive, yet this only deeply knows Zheng.
translations.idiomatic: What I have done to treat him has been extremely shallow and few. I have no great merit that can be named. Yet Yan Zhongzi offered a hundred pieces of gold to toast my parents. Though I did not accept it, this shows he deeply understands me.'

sentences.zh: 夫賢者以感忿睚眦之意，而親信窮僻之人，而政獨安得嘿然而已乎！

translations.literal: Worthy person with sense resentment sidelong glance intention, personally trust poor remote person, yet Zheng alone how can silent and already!
translations.idiomatic: A worthy person, sensing resentment from a sidelong glance, personally trusts a poor and remote person. How can I, Zheng, alone remain silent and do nothing!'

sentences.zh: 且前日要政，政徒以老母；

translations.literal: Moreover previous day invited Zheng, Zheng only because old mother;
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, the previous day he invited me, and I only declined because of my old mother;'

sentences.zh: 老母今以天年終，政將為知己者用。」

translations.literal: Old mother now by heaven years end, Zheng will for knowing self use.'
translations.idiomatic: My old mother has now ended her natural span. I, Zheng, will be used for one who knows me.'

sentences.zh: 乃遂西至濮陽，見嚴仲子曰：「前日所以不許仲子者，徒以親在；

translations.literal: Then went west to Puyang, saw Yan Zhongzi said: 'Previous why not permit Zhongzi, only because parents present;
translations.idiomatic: He then went west to Puyang and saw Yan Zhongzi, saying: 'The reason I did not permit you previously, Zhongzi, was only because my parents were present;'

sentences.zh: 今不幸而母以天年終。

translations.literal: Now unfortunately mother by heaven years end.
translations.idiomatic: now unfortunately my mother has ended her natural span.'

sentences.zh: 仲子所欲報仇者為誰？

translations.literal: Zhongzi what want avenge enemy is who?
translations.idiomatic: Who is the enemy Zhongzi wishes to avenge?'

sentences.zh: 請得從事焉！」

translations.literal: Please can follow undertake!'
translations.idiomatic: Please allow me to undertake it!'

sentences.zh: 嚴仲子具告曰：「臣之仇韓相俠累，俠累又韓君之季父也，宗族盛多，居處兵衛甚設，臣欲使人刺之，（眾）終莫能就。

translations.literal: Yan Zhongzi fully told said: 'Minister enemy Han prime minister Xia Lei, Xia Lei again Han lord younger uncle, clan numerous strong, dwelling place soldiers guards very prepared, minister want make person stab him, finally none can succeed.
translations.idiomatic: Yan Zhongzi fully informed him, saying: 'My enemy is the Han prime minister Xia Lei. Xia Lei is also the younger uncle of the Han lord. His clan is numerous and strong. His dwelling place has soldiers and guards very well prepared. I wanted to have someone stab him, but in the end none could succeed.'

sentences.zh: 今足下幸而不棄，請益其車騎壯士可為足下輔翼者。」

translations.literal: Now your foot fortunately not abandon, please increase his chariot horse strong men can be your foot wing helpers.'
translations.idiomatic: Now fortunately you do not abandon me. Please increase the chariots, horses, and strong men who can serve as your auxiliaries.'

sentences.zh: 聶政曰：「韓之與衛，相去中閒不甚遠，今殺人之相，相又國君之親，此其勢不可以多人，多人不能無生得失，生得失則語泄，語泄是韓舉國而與仲子為讎，豈不殆哉！」

translations.literal: Nie Zheng said: 'Han and Wei, mutually separated middle not very far, now kill person's prime minister, prime minister again country lord relative, this situation cannot many people, many people cannot without living capture loss, living capture loss then words leak, words leak is Han whole country with Zhongzi as enemy, how not dangerous!'
translations.idiomatic: Nie Zheng said: 'Han and Wei are not very far apart from each other. Now to kill a man's prime minister, and the prime minister is also a relative of the country lord - this situation cannot use many people. Many people cannot avoid capture or loss of life. Capture or loss of life would lead to words leaking out. Words leaking out means the whole state of Han would become enemies with Zhongzi. How could this not be dangerous!'

sentences.zh: 遂謝車騎人徒，聶政乃辭獨行。

translations.literal: Then declined chariot horse people followers, Nie Zheng then bid farewell alone go.
translations.idiomatic: He then declined the chariots, horses, people, and followers. Nie Zheng bid farewell and went alone.

translations.literal: Long time, Nie Zheng mother died. Already buried, removed mourning, Nie Zheng said: 'Alas! Zheng is market person, beats knife butchers; Yan Zhongzi is feudal lords' minister, not far thousand li, bent chariot rode befriend minister. Minister treated him, extremely shallow few, not have great merit can match, yet Yan Zhongzi offered hundred jin gold as parents longevity. I though not accept, yet this merely deeply knows Zheng. Worthy person with moved resent glare intention, personally trust poor remote person, yet Zheng alone how can silently already! Moreover previous invited Zheng, Zheng merely because aged mother; Aged mother now heaven years ended, Zheng will for knower use.' Thus west reached Puyang, saw Yan Zhongzi said: 'Previous not permitted Zhongzi, merely because parents in; Now unfortunately mother heaven years ended. Zhongzi desired avenge enmity for who? Please able follow affairs!' Yan Zhongzi completely told: 'Minister's enmity Han minister Xia Lei, Xia Lei again Han lord's younger uncle, clan numerous, dwelling guard weapons very equipped, minister wished make person stab him, finally none could succeed. Now you fortunately not abandon, please increase chariot riders strong warriors can be your assistants.' Nie Zheng said: 'Han and Wei, distance between not very far, now kill person's minister, minister again state lord's relative, this situation cannot many people, many people cannot without alive captured lost, alive captured lost then words leak, words leak is Han whole state with Zhongzi as enmity, how not dangerous!' Thus declined chariot riders people followers, Nie Zheng then alone departed.

sentences.zh: 杖劍至韓，韓相俠累方坐府上，持兵戟而衛侍者甚眾。

translations.literal: Staff sword to Han, Han prime minister Xia Lei just sat government office, held weapons halberds guard attendants very many.
translations.idiomatic: He went to Han with staff and sword. The Han prime minister Xia Lei was just sitting in the government office, holding weapons and halberds while his guarding attendants were very many.

sentences.zh: 聶政直入，上階刺殺俠累，左右大亂。

translations.literal: Nie Zheng straight entered, ascended stairs stabbed killed Xia Lei, left right greatly chaotic.
translations.idiomatic: Nie Zheng went straight in, ascended the stairs and stabbed to death Xia Lei. The left and right were greatly chaotic.

sentences.zh: 聶政大呼，所擊殺者數十人，因自皮面決眼，自屠出腸，遂以死。

translations.literal: Nie Zheng great shout, what struck killed several ten people, because self peeled face gouged eyes, self butchered out intestines, then with die.
translations.idiomatic: Nie Zheng shouted loudly. Those he struck and killed numbered several tens of people. He then peeled his own face, gouged out his eyes, butchered out his intestines, and thus died.

translations.literal: Held sword reached Han, Han minister Xia Lei just sat office above, held weapons halberds while guard attendants very many. Nie Zheng straight entered, ascended stairs stabbed killed Xia Lei, left right greatly chaotic. Nie Zheng greatly called, those he struck killed several ten persons, thus self-flayed face gouged eyes, self-butcher disembowel intestines, thus died.

sentences.zh: 韓取聶政尸暴於市，購問莫知誰子。

translations.literal: Han took Nie Zheng corpse exposed market, reward question none know whose son.
translations.idiomatic: Han took Nie Zheng's corpse and exposed it in the market. They offered rewards but none knew whose son he was.

sentences.zh: 於是韓（購）縣［購］之，有能言殺相俠累者予千金。

translations.literal: Then Han posted reward, have able speak kill prime minister Xia Lei give thousand gold.
translations.idiomatic: Then Han posted a reward, saying anyone who could speak of who killed the prime minister Xia Lei would receive a thousand pieces of gold.

sentences.zh: 久之莫知也。

translations.literal: Long time none know.
translations.idiomatic: After a long time, none knew.

translations.literal: Han took Nie Zheng corpse exposed market, sought questioned none knew whose son. Thus Han offered reward, able speak killed minister Xia Lei give thousand jin gold. Long time none knew.

sentences.zh: 政姊榮聞人有刺殺韓相者，賊不得，國不知其名姓，暴其尸而縣之千金，乃於邑曰：「其是吾弟與？

translations.literal: Zheng sister Rong heard someone stabbed killed Han prime minister, thief not gotten, country not know his name surname, exposed his corpse and reward thousand gold, then in sorrow said: 'Is it my younger brother?
translations.idiomatic: Zheng's sister Rong heard that someone had stabbed and killed the Han prime minister. The thief was not caught. The country did not know his name or surname. They exposed his corpse and offered a thousand pieces of gold reward. She then sorrowfully said: 'Could it be my younger brother?'

sentences.zh: 嗟乎，嚴仲子知吾弟！」

translations.literal: Alas, Yan Zhongzi knows my younger brother!'
translations.idiomatic: Alas, Yan Zhongzi knows my younger brother!'

sentences.zh: 立起，如韓，之市，而死者果政也，伏尸哭極哀，曰：「是軹深井里所謂聶政者也。」

translations.literal: Stood up, went to Han market, and dead one indeed Zheng, prostrated corpse cried extremely sorrowful, said: 'This is Zhi deep well alley called Nie Zheng.'
translations.idiomatic: She stood up and went to the Han market. The dead one was indeed Zheng. She prostrated herself on the corpse and cried extremely sorrowfully, saying: 'This is the one called Nie Zheng from the Deep Well Alley in Zhi.'

sentences.zh: 市行者諸眾人皆曰：「此人暴虐吾國相，王縣購其名姓千金，夫人不聞與？

translations.literal: Market walkers various people all said: 'This person violently abused our country prime minister, king posted reward his name surname thousand gold, madam not hear?
translations.idiomatic: The various people walking in the market all said: 'This person violently abused our country's prime minister. The king has posted a reward of a thousand pieces of gold for his name and surname. Madam, have you not heard?'

sentences.zh: 何敢來識之也？」

translations.literal: How dare come identify him?'
translations.idiomatic: How dare you come to identify him?'

sentences.zh: 榮應之曰：「聞之。

translations.literal: Rong responded said: 'Heard.'
translations.idiomatic: Rong responded: 'I have heard.'

sentences.zh: 然政所以蒙污辱自棄於市販之閒者，為老母幸無恙，妾未嫁也。

translations.literal: Yet Zheng why endured filth humiliation self abandoned among market sellers, for old mother fortunately without illness, concubine not yet married.
translations.idiomatic: Yet the reason Zheng endured filth and humiliation, abandoning himself among market sellers, was to fortunately keep his old mother without illness, and I was not yet married.'

sentences.zh: 親既以天年下世，妾已嫁夫，嚴仲子乃察舉吾弟困污之中而交之，澤厚矣，可柰何！

translations.literal: Parents already by heaven years descend world, concubine already married husband, Yan Zhongzi then examined raised my younger brother from poverty filth middle and made friends with him, favor thick, how can!
translations.idiomatic: My parents have already descended from the world in their natural span. I have already married a husband. Yan Zhongzi then examined and raised my younger brother from the midst of poverty and filth and made friends with him. His favor is thick. What can be done!'

sentences.zh: 士固為知己者死，今乃以妾尚在之故，重自刑以絕從，妾其柰何畏歿身之誅，終滅賢弟之名！」

translations.literal: Scholar certainly for knowing self die, now because concubine still present reason, again self punish to cut off followers, concubine how can fear die body punishment, finally extinguish worthy younger brother name!'
translations.idiomatic: A scholar certainly dies for one who knows him. Now because of the reason that I still exist, he heavily punished himself to cut off followers. How can I fear the punishment of dying and finally extinguish my worthy younger brother's name!'

sentences.zh: 大驚韓市人。

translations.literal: Greatly startled Han market people.
translations.idiomatic: She greatly startled the people of the Han market.

sentences.zh: 乃大呼天者三，卒於邑悲哀而死政之旁。

translations.literal: Then great call heaven three times, finally in sorrow sorrowful died Zheng side.
translations.idiomatic: She then called out to heaven three great times, and finally in sorrow and grief died beside Zheng.

translations.literal: Zheng sister Rong heard had person stabbed killed Han minister, thief not obtained, state not know his name surname, exposed his corpse offered thousand jin gold, thus in sorrow said: 'Perhaps my younger brother? Alas, Yan Zhongzi knows my brother!' Immediately rose, went Han, market, dead person indeed Zheng, prostrated corpse wept extreme sorrow, said: 'This Zhi Shenjing li called Nie Zheng.' Market walkers various people all said: 'This person violently abused our state minister, king offered reward his name surname thousand jin gold, lady not hear? Why dare come identify him?' Rong responded said: 'Heard. Yet Zheng reason bore defilement disgrace self-abandoned in market trading between, for aged mother fortunately without illness, concubine not married. Parents already heaven years descended world, concubine already married husband, Yan Zhongzi then examined promoted my brother poverty defilement middle befriended him, favor thick, how can! Scholar certainly dies for knower, now because concubine still in reason, heavy self-punished to cut followers, concubine how fear death body punishment, finally extinguish worthy brother name!' Greatly startled Han market people. Thus greatly called heaven three times, finally in sorrow sorrow died Zheng side.

sentences.zh: 晉、楚、齊、衛聞之，皆曰：「非獨政能也，乃其姊亦烈女也。

translations.literal: Jin, Chu, Qi, Wei heard, all said: 'Not only Zheng able, moreover his sister also heroic woman.
translations.idiomatic: Jin, Chu, Qi, and Wei heard of it, and all said: 'Not only was Zheng able, but his sister was also a heroic woman.'

sentences.zh: 鄉使政誠知其姊無濡忍之志，不重暴骸之難，必絕險千里以列其名，姊弟俱僇於韓市者，亦未必敢以身許嚴仲子也。

translations.literal: If make Zheng truly know his sister no lingering endure intention, not regard violently expose corpse difficulty, must cut off dangerous thousand li to establish his name, sister younger brother both executed Han market, also perhaps not dare with body promise Yan Zhongzi.
translations.idiomatic: If Zheng had truly known that his sister had no lingering intention to endure, and did not regard the difficulty of violently exposing the corpse, he would certainly have cut off the danger and traveled a thousand li to establish his name. If sister and younger brother had both been executed in the Han market, he also might not have dared to promise his body to Yan Zhongzi.'

sentences.zh: 嚴仲子亦可謂知人能得士矣！」

translations.literal: Yan Zhongzi also can be called knows person able get scholars!'
translations.idiomatic: Yan Zhongzi can also be called one who knows people and is able to obtain scholars!'

translations.literal: Jin, Chu, Qi, Wei heard, all said: 'Not only Zheng able, his sister also fierce woman. If made Zheng truly know his sister no soft endure will, not heavy expose corpse difficulty, must cut danger thousand li to establish his name, brother sister both executed Han market, also perhaps not dare with body promise Yan Zhongzi. Yan Zhongzi also can call know person able obtain scholars!'

sentences.zh: 其後二百二十餘年秦有荊軻之事。

translations.literal: After two hundred twenty plus years Qin had Jing Ke affair.
translations.idiomatic: Two hundred and twenty years later, Qin had the affair of Jing Ke.

translations.literal: After two hundred twenty plus years Qin had Jing Ke affair.

sentences.zh: 荊軻者，衛人也。

translations.literal: Jing Ke was Wei person.
translations.idiomatic: Jing Ke was a man of Wei.

sentences.zh: 其先乃齊人，徙於衛，衛人謂之慶卿。

translations.literal: His ancestors were Qi people, moved to Wei, Wei people called him Qing Qing.
translations.idiomatic: His ancestors were people of Qi who moved to Wei. The people of Wei called him Qing Qing.

sentences.zh: 而之燕，燕人謂之荊卿。

translations.literal: Went to Yan, Yan people called him Jing Qing.
translations.idiomatic: He went to Yan, and the people of Yan called him Jing Qing.

translations.literal: Jing Ke was Wei person. His ancestor was Qi person, moved to Wei, Wei people called him Qing Qing. Went to Yan, Yan people called him Jing Qing.

sentences.zh: 荊卿好讀書擊劍，以術說衛元君，衛元君不用。

translations.literal: Jing Qing liked reading books striking sword, with arts persuaded Wei Yuan Jun, Wei Yuan Jun not used.
translations.idiomatic: Jing Qing liked reading books and striking swords. He persuaded Duke Yuan of Wei with his arts, but Duke Yuan of Wei did not employ him.

sentences.zh: 其後秦伐魏，置東郡，徙衛元君之支屬於野王。

translations.literal: After Qin attacked Wei, established Dong Jun, moved Wei Yuan Jun branch relatives to Ye Wang.
translations.idiomatic: After this, Qin attacked Wei, established Dong Commandery, and moved Duke Yuan of Wei's collateral relatives to Yewang.

translations.literal: Jing Qing liked read books strike sword, with strategy persuaded Wei Yuan Jun, Wei Yuan Jun not used. Afterward Qin attacked Wei, established Dong commandery, moved Wei Yuan Jun branch relatives to Ye Wang.

sentences.zh: 荊軻嘗游過榆次，與蓋聶論劍，蓋聶怒而目之。

translations.literal: Jing Ke once traveled passed Yu Ci, with Gai Nie discussed sword, Gai Nie angry glared at him.
translations.idiomatic: Jing Ke once traveled past Yuci and discussed swords with Gai Nie. Gai Nie became angry and glared at him.

sentences.zh: 荊軻出，人或言復召荊卿。

translations.literal: Jing Ke went out, person some said again summoned Jing Qing.
translations.idiomatic: Jing Ke went out. Someone said he was summoned again as Jing Qing.

sentences.zh: 蓋聶曰：「曩者吾與論劍有不稱者，吾目之；

translations.literal: Gai Nie said: 'Formerly I with him discussed sword had unworthy, I glared at him;
translations.idiomatic: Gai Nie said: 'Formerly when I discussed swords with him there were unworthy things. I glared at him;'

sentences.zh: 試往，是宜去，不敢留。」

translations.literal: Try go, this suitable leave, not dare stay.'
translations.idiomatic: try going - this is suitable for leaving, I dare not stay.'

sentences.zh: 使使往之主人，荊卿則已駕而去榆次矣。

translations.literal: Made envoy go to host, Jing Qing then already harnessed carriage left Yu Ci.
translations.idiomatic: He sent an envoy to go to the host. Jing Qing had already harnessed his carriage and left Yuci.

sentences.zh: 使者還報，蓋聶曰：「固去也，吾曩者目攝之！」

translations.literal: Envoy returned reported, Gai Nie said: 'Indeed left, my formerly glared intimidated him!'
translations.idiomatic: The envoy returned and reported. Gai Nie said: 'He has indeed left. My former glare intimidated him!'

translations.literal: Jing Ke once traveled passed Yu Ci, with Gai Nie discussed sword, Gai Nie angered glared at him. Jing Ke exited, person some said again summoned Jing Qing. Gai Nie said: 'Previously I with him discussed sword had disagreement, I glared at him; Try go, this suitable leave, not dare stay.' Made envoy go his lodging, Jing Qing then already harnessed departed Yu Ci. Envoy returned reported, Gai Nie said: 'Certainly left, my previously glared frightened him!'

sentences.zh: 荊軻游於邯鄲，魯句踐與荊軻博，爭道，魯句踐怒而叱之，荊軻嘿而逃去，遂不復會。

translations.literal: Jing Ke traveled Handan, Lu Gou Jian with Jing Ke gambled, contended road, Lu Gou Jian angry scolded him, Jing Ke silent escaped gone, then not again meet.
translations.idiomatic: Jing Ke traveled in Handan. Lu Goujian gambled with Jing Ke, contended over the road, Lu Goujian became angry and scolded him. Jing Ke silently escaped and left, and they never met again.

translations.literal: Jing Ke traveled Handan, Lu Gou Jian with Jing Ke gambled, contended road, Lu Gou Jian angered scolded him, Jing Ke silent escaped departed, thus not again met.

sentences.zh: 荊軻既至燕，愛燕之狗屠及善擊筑者高漸離。

translations.literal: Jing Ke already to Yan, loved Yan dog butcher and skilled striking zhu Gao Jian Li.
translations.idiomatic: Jing Ke, having arrived in Yan, loved Yan's dog butcher and the skilled zhu striker Gao Jianli.

sentences.zh: 荊軻嗜酒，日與狗屠及高漸離飲於燕市，酒酣以往，高漸離擊筑，荊軻和而歌於市中，相樂也，已而相泣，旁若無人者。

translations.literal: Jing Ke addicted wine, daily with dog butcher and Gao Jian Li drank Yan market, wine plentiful then past, Gao Jian Li struck zhu, Jing Ke harmonized sang market middle, mutually happy, then mutually wept, side as no person.
translations.idiomatic: Jing Ke was addicted to wine. Daily he drank in the Yan market with the dog butcher and Gao Jianli. When the wine became plentiful and they went past it, Gao Jianli struck the zhu, Jing Ke harmonized and sang in the market. They enjoyed themselves mutually, then wept mutually, as if there were no others beside them.

sentences.zh: 荊軻雖游於酒人乎，然其為人沈深好書；

translations.literal: Jing Ke though wandered among wine people, yet his person deep profound liked books;
translations.idiomatic: Though Jing Ke wandered among wine people, yet his character was deep and profound and he liked books;

sentences.zh: 其所游諸侯，盡與其賢豪長者相結。

translations.literal: Those lords he traveled, all with their worthy heroes elders made friends.
translations.idiomatic: The various lords he traveled among, he befriended all their worthy heroes and elders.

sentences.zh: 其之燕，燕之處士田光先生亦善待之，知其非庸人也。

translations.literal: His going to Yan, Yan reclusive scholar Tian Guang mister also treated him well, knew he not common person.
translations.idiomatic: When he went to Yan, the Yan reclusive scholar Master Tian Guang also treated him well, knowing he was no common person.

translations.literal: Jing Ke having reached Yan, loved Yan's dog butcher and good beat zhu Gao Jian Li. Jing Ke addicted wine, daily with dog butcher and Gao Jian Li drank Yan market, wine flowing then went, Gao Jian Li beat zhu, Jing Ke harmonized sang in market middle, mutually happy, already then mutually wept, side as no person. Jing Ke though wandered among wine people, yet his person deep profound good books; His traveled feudal lords, all befriended their worthy heroes elders. His went Yan, Yan's recluse Tian Guang mister also well treated him, knew he not common person.

sentences.zh: 居頃之，會燕太子丹質秦亡歸燕。

translations.literal: Dwelt period, met Yan crown prince Dan hostage Qin fled returned Yan.
translations.idiomatic: After dwelling for a while, he met Prince Dan of Yan who had been a hostage in Qin, fled, and returned to Yan.

sentences.zh: 燕太子丹者，故嘗質於趙，而秦王政生於趙，其少時與丹驩。

translations.literal: Yan crown prince Dan, formerly hostage Zhao, Qin king Zheng born Zhao, his young time with Dan happy.
translations.idiomatic: Prince Dan of Yan had formerly been a hostage in Zhao, and King Zheng of Qin was born in Zhao. In his youth he had been happy with Dan.

sentences.zh: 及政立為秦王，而丹質於秦。

translations.literal: When Zheng established Qin king, Dan hostage Qin.
translations.idiomatic: When Zheng established himself as King of Qin, Dan was a hostage in Qin.

sentences.zh: 秦王之遇燕太子丹不善，故丹怨而亡歸。

translations.literal: Qin king treated Yan crown prince Dan not well, therefore Dan resented fled returned.
translations.idiomatic: The King of Qin treated Prince Dan of Yan poorly, so Dan resented him and fled back.

sentences.zh: 歸而求為報秦王者，國小，力不能。

translations.literal: Returned sought to avenge Qin king, country small, strength not able.
translations.idiomatic: Upon returning, he sought those who could avenge him against the King of Qin, but his country was small and its strength was not sufficient.

sentences.zh: 其後秦日出兵山東以伐齊、楚、三晉，稍蠶食諸侯，且至於燕，燕君臣皆恐禍之至。

translations.literal: After Qin daily sent troops Shandong to attack Qi, Chu, three Jin, gradually nibbled lords, moreover reached Yan, Yan lord ministers all feared calamity coming.
translations.idiomatic: After this, Qin daily sent troops east of the mountains to attack Qi, Chu, and the Three Jin. They gradually nibbled away at the lords and reached Yan. The lords and ministers of Yan all feared that calamity was coming.

sentences.zh: 太子丹患之，問其傅鞠武。

translations.literal: Crown prince Dan troubled, asked his tutor Ju Wu.
translations.idiomatic: Prince Dan was troubled by this and asked his tutor Ju Wu.

sentences.zh: 武對曰：「秦地遍天下，威脅韓、魏、趙氏，北有甘泉、谷口之固，南有涇、渭之沃，擅巴、漢之饒，右隴、蜀之山，左關、殽之險，民眾而士厲，兵革有餘。

translations.literal: Wu answered: 'Qin land covers world, threatens Han, Wei, Zhao clans, north has Gan Quan, Gu Kou fortifications, south has Jing, Wei fertility, monopolizes Ba, Han richness, right Long, Shu mountains, left Guan, Xiao dangers, people numerous warriors fierce, armor weapons surplus.
translations.idiomatic: Wu answered: 'Qin's lands cover the world. It threatens the Han, Wei, and Zhao clans. To the north it has the fortifications of Ganquan and Gukou. To the south it has the fertility of Jing and Wei. It monopolizes the richness of Ba and Han. To the right are the mountains of Long and Shu. To the left are the dangers of Guan and Xiao. Its people are numerous and its warriors fierce. Its armor and weapons are in surplus.'

sentences.zh: 意有所出，則長城之南，易水以北，未有所定也。

translations.literal: Intention has issue, then south Great Wall, Yi Shui north, not yet determined.
translations.idiomatic: If its intentions have an outlet, then south of the Great Wall and north of the Yi River, nothing will be determined.'

sentences.zh: 柰何以見陵之怨，欲批其逆鱗哉！」

translations.literal: How with insulted resentment, want strike his reversed scales!'
translations.idiomatic: How can you, with resentment from being insulted, want to strike his reversed scales!'

sentences.zh: 丹曰：「然則何由？」

translations.literal: Dan said: 'Then by what?'
translations.idiomatic: Dan said: 'Then by what means?'

sentences.zh: 對曰：「請入圖之。」

translations.literal: Answered: 'Please enter plan it.'
translations.idiomatic: He answered: 'Please allow me to enter and plan it.'

translations.literal: Dwelt moment, met Yan crown prince Dan hostage Qin fled returned Yan. Yan crown prince Dan, formerly often hostage Zhao, Qin king Zheng born in Zhao, his young time with Dan friendly. When Zheng established as Qin king, Dan hostage in Qin. Qin king treated Yan crown prince Dan not good, thus Dan resented fled returned. Returned sought become avenge Qin king, state small, strength could not. Afterward Qin daily sent troops east to attack Qi, Chu, three Jin, gradually nibbled feudal lords, moreover reached Yan, Yan ruler ministers all feared calamity arrived. Crown prince Dan worried, asked his tutor Ju Wu. Wu responded: 'Qin land covers world, threatens Han, Wei, Zhao clans, north has Gan Quan, Gu Kou solid, south has Jing, Wei fertile, monopolizes Ba, Han rich, right Long, Shu mountains, left Guan, Xiao dangers, people many soldiers sharp, weapons armor surplus. Intent has out, then Great Wall south, Yi water north, not yet decided. How with seen humiliate resentment, wish slap his reverse scales!' Dan said: 'Then how?' Responded: 'Please let me enter and consider the maps.'

sentences.zh: 居有閒，秦將樊於期得罪於秦王，亡之燕，太子受而捨之。

translations.literal: Dwelt had leisure, Qin general Fan Yu Qi offended Qin king, fled to Yan, crown prince received lodged him.
translations.idiomatic: After dwelling for a while, the Qin general Fan Yuqi offended the King of Qin, fled to Yan, and the crown prince received and lodged him.

sentences.zh: 鞠武諫曰：「不可。

translations.literal: Ju Wu advised: 'Cannot.'
translations.idiomatic: Ju Wu advised: 'That cannot be done.'

sentences.zh: 夫以秦王之暴而積怒於燕，足為寒心，又況聞樊將軍之所在乎？

translations.literal: With Qin king violent accumulated anger at Yan, sufficient chill heart, moreover hear Fan general location?
translations.idiomatic: With the King of Qin's violence and accumulated anger at Yan, it is sufficient to chill the heart. Moreover, what if he hears where General Fan is?'

sentences.zh: 是謂『委肉當餓虎之蹊』也，禍必不振矣！

translations.literal: This called 'throw meat hungry tiger path', calamity must not revive!
translations.idiomatic: This is called 'throwing meat in the path of a hungry tiger.' The calamity will certainly not be revived!'

sentences.zh: 雖有管、晏，不能為之謀也。

translations.literal: Though have Guan, Yan, cannot plan for him.
translations.idiomatic: Though there were Guan Zhong and Yan Ying, they could not plan for him.'

sentences.zh: 願太子疾遣樊將軍入匈奴以滅口。

translations.literal: Wish crown prince quickly send Fan general enter Xiongnu silence mouth.
translations.idiomatic: I wish the crown prince to quickly send General Fan into the Xiongnu to silence him.'

sentences.zh: 請西約三晉，南連齊、楚，北購於單于，其後乃可圖也。」

translations.literal: Please west ally three Jin, south connect Qi, Chu, north bribe Shan Yu, after then can plan.'
translations.idiomatic: Please ally with the Three Jin to the west, connect with Qi and Chu to the south, bribe the Chanyu to the north. After that it can be planned.'

sentences.zh: 太子曰：「太傅之計，曠日彌久，心惛然，恐不能須臾。

translations.literal: Crown prince said: 'Grand Tutor plan, far day increasingly long, heart confused, fear cannot wait moment.
translations.idiomatic: The crown prince said: 'The Grand Tutor's plan takes increasingly far days. My heart is confused. I fear I cannot wait even a moment.'

sentences.zh: 且非獨於此也，夫樊將軍窮困於天下，歸身於丹，丹終不以迫於彊秦而棄所哀憐之交，置之匈奴，是固丹命卒之時也。

translations.literal: Moreover not only this, Fan general poor destitute world, gave body Dan, Dan end not because pressed strong Qin abandon pitied friendship, place Xiongnu, this indeed Dan fate end time.
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, it is not only this. General Fan is poor and destitute in the world. He gave his body to me, Dan. I, Dan, will ultimately not abandon the friendship I pity because of being pressed by strong Qin and place him in the Xiongnu. This is indeed the time when my, Dan's, fate ends.'

sentences.zh: 願太傅更慮之。」

translations.literal: Wish Grand Tutor reconsider.'
translations.idiomatic: I wish the Grand Tutor to reconsider it.'

sentences.zh: 鞠武曰：「夫行危欲求安，造禍而求福，計淺而怨深，連結一人之後交，不顧國家之大害，此所謂『資怨而助禍』矣。

translations.literal: Ju Wu said: 'Walk danger seek safety, create calamity seek fortune, plan shallow resentment deep, link one person later friendship, not consider state great harm, this called 'provide resentment help calamity'.
translations.idiomatic: Ju Wu said: 'To walk in danger desiring safety, to create calamity seeking fortune, with shallow plans and deep resentment, linking a later friendship with one person without considering the state's great harm - this is called 'providing resentment and helping calamity'.'

sentences.zh: 夫以鴻毛燎於爐炭之上，必無事矣。

translations.literal: With goose feather burn furnace charcoal, must no affair.
translations.idiomatic: To burn a goose feather on furnace charcoal - there will certainly be no affair.'

sentences.zh: 且以鵰鷙之秦，行怨暴之怒，豈足道哉！

translations.literal: Moreover eagle fierce Qin, carry resentment violent anger, how worth speak!
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, with eagle-like fierce Qin carrying resentment and violent anger, how is it worth speaking of!'

sentences.zh: 燕有田光先生，其為人智深而勇沈，可與謀。」

translations.literal: Yan has Tian Guang mister, his person wisdom deep courage deep, can with plan.'
translations.idiomatic: Yan has Master Tian Guang. His character has deep wisdom and deep courage. He can be consulted.'

sentences.zh: 太子曰：「願因太傅而得交於田先生，可乎？」

translations.literal: Crown prince said: 'Wish through Grand Tutor get make friends Tian mister, can?'
translations.idiomatic: The crown prince said: 'I wish to make friends with Master Tian through the Grand Tutor. Is that possible?'

sentences.zh: 鞠武曰：「敬諾。」

translations.literal: Ju Wu said: 'Respectful yes.'
translations.idiomatic: Ju Wu said: 'Respectfully, yes.'

sentences.zh: 出見田先生，道「太子願圖國事於先生也」。

translations.literal: Went out saw Tian mister, said 'Crown prince wishes plan state affairs with mister.'
translations.idiomatic: He went out and saw Master Tian, saying: 'The crown prince wishes to plan state affairs with you, Master.'

sentences.zh: 田光曰：「敬奉教。」

translations.literal: Tian Guang said: 'Respectfully receive teaching.'
translations.idiomatic: Tian Guang said: 'I respectfully receive your teaching.'

sentences.zh: 乃造焉。

translations.literal: Then went to him.
translations.idiomatic: He then went to him.

translations.literal: Dwelt some time, Qin general Fan Yuji offended Qin king, fled to Yan, crown prince received and sheltered him. Ju Wu advised: 'Cannot. With Qin king's violence and accumulated anger at Yan, enough to chill the heart, moreover if hears Fan general's location? This called 'placing meat on hungry tiger path', calamity certainly not recoverable! Though have Guan, Yan, cannot plan for it. Wish crown prince quickly send Fan general to Xiongnu to silence mouth. Please west ally three Jin, south connect Qi, Chu, north bribe Xiongnu chief, afterward then can plot.' Crown prince said: 'Grand Tutor's plan, broad days increasingly long, heart confused, fear cannot wait moment. Moreover not only this, Fan general poor distressed in world, gave body to Dan, Dan end not because pressed by strong Qin abandon pitied friendship, place in Xiongnu, this certainly Dan's doomed time. Wish Grand Tutor reconsider.' Ju Wu said: 'Go danger seek safety, create calamity seek fortune, plan shallow resentment deep, connect one person's later friendship, not consider state's great harm, this called 'provide resentment assist calamity'. With goose feather burn on furnace charcoal above, certainly no affair. Moreover with eagle owl Qin, execute resentful violent anger, how sufficient say! Yan has Tian Guang mister, his person wisdom deep courage profound, can with plan.' Crown prince said: 'Wish through Grand Tutor get befriend Tian mister, can?' Ju Wu said: 'Respectfully yes.' Exit saw Tian mister, said 'Crown prince wishes plot state affairs with mister.' Tian Guang said: 'Respectfully receive teaching.' Thus went to him.

sentences.zh: 太子逢迎，卻行為導，跪而蔽席。

translations.literal: Crown prince welcomed, retreated walked guided, knelt spread mat.
translations.idiomatic: The crown prince welcomed him, retreated and walked as guide, knelt and spread the mat.

sentences.zh: 田光坐定，左右無人，太子避席而請曰：「燕秦不兩立，願先生留意也。」

translations.literal: Tian Guang sat fixed, left right none person, crown prince left mat requested said: 'Yan Qin not both stand, wish mister pay attention.'
translations.idiomatic: Tian Guang sat firmly. There were no people on the left and right. The crown prince left his mat and requested: 'Yan and Qin cannot both stand. I wish you, Master, to pay attention.'

sentences.zh: 田光曰：「臣聞騏驥盛壯之時，一日而馳千里；

translations.literal: Tian Guang said: 'Minister heard divine horse vigorous time, one day gallop thousand li;
translations.idiomatic: Tian Guang said: 'I have heard that when a divine horse is vigorous, it can gallop a thousand li in one day;'

sentences.zh: 至其衰老，駑馬先之。

translations.literal: To its old age, inferior horse precede it.
translations.idiomatic: when it reaches old age, an inferior horse precedes it.'

sentences.zh: 今太子聞光盛壯之時，不知臣精已消亡矣。

translations.literal: Now crown prince hear light vigorous time, not know minister essence already extinguished.
translations.idiomatic: Now the crown prince hears of my vigorous time but does not know that my minister's essence has already been extinguished.'

sentences.zh: 雖然，光不敢以圖國事，所善荊卿可使也。」

translations.literal: Although, light not dare plan state affairs, what good Jing Qing can use.'
translations.idiomatic: Although this is so, I, Guang, do not dare to plan state affairs. The Jing Qing whom I am friendly with can be used.'

sentences.zh: 太子曰：「願因先生得結交於荊卿，可乎？」

translations.literal: Crown prince said: 'Wish through mister get make friends Jing Qing, can?'
translations.idiomatic: The crown prince said: 'I wish to make friends with Jing Qing through you, Master. Is that possible?'

sentences.zh: 田光曰：「敬諾。」

translations.literal: Tian Guang said: 'Respectful yes.'
translations.idiomatic: Tian Guang said: 'Respectfully, yes.'

sentences.zh: 即起，趨出。

translations.literal: Immediately rose, hurried out.
translations.idiomatic: He immediately rose and hurried out.

sentences.zh: 太子送至門，戒曰：「丹所報，先生所言者，國之大事也，願先生勿泄也！」

translations.literal: Crown prince sent to door, warned said: 'Dan what report, mister what speak, state great matter, wish mister not leak!'
translations.idiomatic: The crown prince sent him to the door and warned: 'What I, Dan, report and what you, Master, speak are great matters of state. I wish you, Master, not to leak them!'

sentences.zh: 田光俛而笑曰：「諾。」

translations.literal: Tian Guang bowed smiled said: 'Yes.'
translations.idiomatic: Tian Guang bowed and smiled, saying: 'Yes.'

sentences.zh: 僂行見荊卿，曰：「光與子相善，燕國莫不知。

translations.literal: Bent walked saw Jing Qing, said: 'Light with you good friends, Yan country none not know.
translations.idiomatic: He bent and walked to see Jing Qing, saying: 'I, Guang, am good friends with you. No one in Yan country does not know this.'

sentences.zh: 今太子聞光壯盛之時，不知吾形已不逮也，幸而教之曰『燕秦不兩立，願先生留意也』。

translations.literal: Now crown prince hear light vigorous time, not know my form already not equal, fortunately taught said 'Yan Qin not both stand, wish mister pay attention.'
translations.idiomatic: Now the crown prince hears of my vigorous time but does not know that my form is already unequal. Fortunately he taught me, saying: 'Yan and Qin cannot both stand. I wish you, Master, to pay attention.'

sentences.zh: 光竊不自外，言足下於太子也，願足下過太子於宮。」

translations.literal: Light secretly not exclude self, spoke you to crown prince, wish you visit crown prince at palace.'
translations.idiomatic: I, Guang, secretly did not exclude myself. I spoke of you to the crown prince. I wish you to visit the crown prince at the palace.'

sentences.zh: 荊軻曰：「謹奉教。」

translations.literal: Jing Ke said: 'Respectfully receive teaching.'
translations.idiomatic: Jing Ke said: 'I respectfully receive your teaching.'

sentences.zh: 田光曰：「吾聞之，長者為行，不使人疑之。

translations.literal: Tian Guang said: 'I heard, elders for action, not make people suspect.
translations.idiomatic: Tian Guang said: 'I have heard that elders, when acting, do not make people suspect them.'

sentences.zh: 今太子告光曰：『所言者，國之大事也，願先生勿泄』，是太子疑光也。

translations.literal: Now crown prince told light said: 'what speak, state great matter, wish mister not leak', this crown prince suspect light.
translations.idiomatic: Now the crown prince told me: 'What is spoken is a great matter of state. I wish you, Master, not to leak it.' This shows the crown prince suspects me.'

sentences.zh: 夫為行而使人疑之，非節俠也。」

translations.literal: For action yet make people suspect, not righteous knight.'
translations.idiomatic: To act yet make people suspect you is not the way of a righteous knight.'

sentences.zh: 欲自殺以激荊卿，曰：「願足下急過太子，言光已死，明不言也。」

translations.literal: Wished suicide to spur Jing Qing, said: 'Wish you quickly visit crown prince, say light already dead, make clear not speak.'
translations.idiomatic: He wished to suicide to spur Jing Qing, saying: 'I wish you to quickly visit the crown prince and say that I, Guang, have already died, making clear that I did not speak.'

sentences.zh: 因遂自刎而死。

translations.literal: Because then self cut throat died.
translations.idiomatic: He then cut his own throat and died.

translations.literal: Crown prince welcomed, retreated walked guided, knelt spread mat. Tian Guang sat settled, left right no person, crown prince left seat requested: 'Yan Qin not two stand, wish mister attentive.' Tian Guang said: 'Minister heard thoroughbred in vigorous time, one day gallop thousand li; To its old age, nag precede it. Now crown prince hears my vigorous time, not know minister's essence already perished. Although so, Guang not dare with plot state affairs, what good Jing Qing can send.' Crown prince said: 'Wish through mister get befriend Jing Qing, can?' Tian Guang said: 'Respectfully yes.' Immediately rose, hurried out. Crown prince sent to door, warned: 'Dan what report, mister what speak, state's great affair, wish mister not leak!' Tian Guang bent laughed: 'Yes.' Bent walked saw Jing Ke, said: 'Guang with you friendly, Yan state none not know. Now crown prince hears Guang vigorous time, not know my form already not match, fortunately teach said 'Yan Qin not two stand, wish mister attentive'. Guang secretly not self-exclude, spoke you to crown prince, wish you visit crown prince at palace.' Jing Ke said: 'Respectfully receive teaching.' Tian Guang said: 'I heard, elder for conduct, not make people suspect. Now crown prince told Guang: 'What speak state's great affair, wish mister not leak', this crown prince suspects Guang.
