Do conduct yet make people suspect, not righteous knight.' Wished suicide to spur Jing Ke, said: 'Wish you quickly visit crown prince, speak Guang already dead, clarify not speak.' Thus then self-slit died.

sentences.zh: 荊軻遂見太子，言田光已死，致光之言。

translations.literal: Jing Ke then saw crown prince, spoke Tian Guang already died, conveyed Guang's words.
translations.idiomatic: Jing Ke then saw the crown prince, spoke of Tian Guang having died, and conveyed Guang's words.

sentences.zh: 太子再拜而跪，膝行流涕，有頃而後言曰：「丹所以誡田先生毋言者，欲以成大事之謀也。

translations.literal: Crown prince twice bowed knelt, knee walked flowing tears, after while then spoke said: 'Dan what warned Tian mister not speak, wanted to complete great matter plan.
translations.idiomatic: The crown prince bowed twice and knelt, crawled on his knees with flowing tears. After a while he spoke: 'The reason I warned Master Tian not to speak was to complete the plan of a great matter.'

sentences.zh: 今田先生以死明不言，豈丹之心哉！」

translations.literal: Now Tian mister with death make clear not speak, how Dan's heart!'
translations.idiomatic: Now Master Tian has made clear with death that he did not speak. How could this be my, Dan's, heart!'

sentences.zh: 荊軻坐定，太子避席頓首曰：「田先生不知丹之不肖，使得至前，敢有所道，此天之所以哀燕而不棄其孤也。

translations.literal: Jing Ke sat fixed, crown prince left seat kowtowed said: 'Tian mister not know Dan's unworthiness, made arrive front, dare have what say, this heaven what pity Yan not abandon its orphan.
translations.idiomatic: Jing Ke sat firmly. The crown prince left his seat and kowtowed, saying: 'Master Tian did not know of my, Dan's, unworthiness. He made me arrive before you. I dare to say something. This is heaven pitying Yan and not abandoning its orphan.'

sentences.zh: 今秦有貪利之心，而欲不可足也。

translations.literal: Now Qin has greedy benefit heart, yet desire not can satisfy.
translations.idiomatic: Now Qin has a heart greedy for benefit, and its desires cannot be satisfied.'

sentences.zh: 非盡天下之地，臣海內之王者，其意不厭。

translations.literal: Not exhaust world land, minister within seas kings, its intention not sated.
translations.idiomatic: Unless it exhausts the world's lands and makes the kings within the seas its ministers, its intentions will not be sated.'

sentences.zh: 今秦已虜韓王，盡納其地。

translations.literal: Now Qin already captured Han king, completely took its land.
translations.idiomatic: Now Qin has already captured the Han king and completely taken its lands.'

sentences.zh: 又舉兵南伐楚，北臨趙；

translations.literal: Again raised troops south attacked Chu, north approached Zhao;
translations.idiomatic: It has again raised troops to attack Chu to the south and approach Zhao to the north;'

sentences.zh: 王翦將數十萬之眾距漳、鄴，而李信出太原、雲中。

translations.literal: Wang Jian led several ten thousand crowd resisted Zhang, Ye, Li Xin went out Taiyuan, Yunzhong.
translations.idiomatic: Wang Jian leads a crowd of several hundred thousand to resist at Zhang and Ye, while Li Xin goes out from Taiyuan and Yunzhong.'

sentences.zh: 趙不能支秦，必入臣，入臣則禍至燕。

translations.literal: Zhao cannot support Qin, must enter minister, enter minister then calamity reach Yan.
translations.idiomatic: Zhao cannot support Qin and must become its minister. When it becomes minister, calamity will reach Yan.'

sentences.zh: 燕小弱，數困於兵，今計舉國不足以當秦。

translations.literal: Yan small weak, several times troubled by troops, now plan whole country not sufficient match Qin.
translations.idiomatic: Yan is small and weak. It has been troubled by troops several times. Now planning with the whole country is not sufficient to match Qin.'

sentences.zh: 諸侯服秦，莫敢合從。

translations.literal: Lords submit Qin, none dare join vertical.
translations.idiomatic: The lords submit to Qin. None dare form alliances against it.'

sentences.zh: 丹之私計愚，以為誠得天下之勇士使於秦，闚以重利；

translations.literal: Dan's private plan foolish, think truly get world's brave men make go to Qin, spy with heavy benefits;
translations.idiomatic: My, Dan's, private plan is foolish. I think that truly getting a brave man of the world to go to Qin and tempt him with heavy benefits;'

sentences.zh: 秦王貪，其勢必得所願矣。

translations.literal: Qin king greedy, its situation must get what wished.
translations.idiomatic: the Qin king is greedy. In this situation he must get what he wishes.'

sentences.zh: 誠得劫秦王，使悉反諸侯侵地，若曹沫之與齊桓公，則大善矣；

translations.literal: Truly get hijack Qin king, make return all lords invaded land, like Cao Mo with Qi Huan Gong, then very good;
translations.idiomatic: truly getting to hijack the Qin king and make him return all the lands invaded from the lords, like Cao Mo did with Duke Huan of Qi - that would be very good;'

sentences.zh: 則不可，因而刺殺之。

translations.literal: Then cannot, because stab kill him.
translations.idiomatic: if that cannot be done, then because of this, stab and kill him.'

sentences.zh: 彼秦大將擅兵於外而內有亂，則君臣相疑，以其閒諸侯得合從，其破秦必矣。

translations.literal: That Qin great general monopolize troops outside yet inside have chaos, then lord minister mutually suspect, with its interval lords get join vertical, break Qin must.
translations.idiomatic: Then Qin's great generals will monopolize troops outside while there is chaos inside. Lord and minister will mutually suspect each other. In that interval, the lords can form alliances against Qin. Breaking Qin will certainly happen.'

sentences.zh: 此丹之上願，而不知所委命，唯荊卿留意焉。」

translations.literal: This Dan's highest wish, yet not know entrust life, only Jing Qing pay attention.'
translations.idiomatic: This is my, Dan's, highest wish. Yet I do not know to whom to entrust my life. Only you, Jing Qing, pay attention to this.'

sentences.zh: 久之，荊軻曰：「此國之大事也，臣駑下，恐不足任使。」

translations.literal: Long time, Jing Ke said: 'This state great matter, minister inferior, fear not sufficient undertake.'
translations.idiomatic: After a long time, Jing Ke said: 'This is a great matter of state. I, minister, am inferior. I fear I am not sufficient to undertake it.'

sentences.zh: 太子前頓首，固請毋讓，然後許諾。

translations.literal: Crown prince front kowtowed, firmly requested not decline, then permitted agreed.
translations.idiomatic: The crown prince kowtowed in front and firmly requested that he not decline. Then he permitted and agreed.

sentences.zh: 於是尊荊卿為上卿，舍上舍。

translations.literal: Then honored Jing Qing as upper minister, lodged upper lodging.
translations.idiomatic: He then honored Jing Qing as an upper minister and lodged him in the upper lodging.

sentences.zh: 太子日造門下，供太牢具，異物閒進，車騎美女恣荊軻所欲，以順適其意。

translations.literal: Crown prince daily made gate below, supplied great sacrificial vessels, rare things intermittently advanced, chariots horses beauties indulged Jing Ke desired, to comply adapt his intention.
translations.idiomatic: The crown prince daily went to his gate and supplied great sacrificial vessels. Rare things were intermittently advanced. Chariots, horses, and beauties indulged whatever Jing Ke desired, to comply with and adapt to his intentions.

translations.literal: Jing Ke thus saw crown prince, spoke Tian Guang already dead, conveyed Guang's words. Crown prince twice bowed knelt, knee walked flowing tears, had moment then spoke: 'Dan so warned Tian mister not speak, wished complete great affair plan. Now Tian mister with death clarify not speak, how Dan's heart!' Jing Ke sat settled, crown prince left seat bowed head: 'Tian mister not know Dan's unworthiness, made reach front, dared have way, this heaven so pity Yan not abandon its orphan. Now Qin has greedy profit heart, yet desire not satisfiable. Not exhaust world land, make sea inner king, his intent not sated. Now Qin already captured Han king, completely took its land. Again raised troops south attacked Chu, north faced Zhao; Wang Jian leads several ten thousand crowd resisted Zhang, Ye, while Li Xin exits Taiyuan, Yunzhong. Zhao cannot support Qin, must enter minister, enter minister then calamity reaches Yan.' Yan small weak, repeatedly distressed by troops, now plan whole state not sufficient to resist Qin. Feudal lords submit Qin, none dare vertical alliance. Dan's private plan foolish, considered truly get world's brave warriors send to Qin, spy with heavy profit; Qin king greedy, his situation must get what wish. Truly get kidnap Qin king, make completely return feudal lords invaded land, like Cao Mo with Qi Huan Gong, then very good; If cannot, moreover stab kill him. That Qin great generals monopolize troops outside while inner has chaos, then ruler ministers mutually suspect, with their interval feudal lords get vertical alliance, their break Qin certain. This Dan's upper wish, yet not know entrust life, only Jing Qing attentive.' Long time, Jing Ke said: 'This state's great affair, minister inferior, fear not sufficient undertake mission.' Crown prince front bowed head, firmly requested not decline, then permitted promised. Thus honored Jing Qing as upper minister, lodged upper lodge. Crown prince daily made door, supplied great feast prepared, rare objects frequent presented, chariot horses beauties indulged Jing Ke what desired, to comply suit his intent.

sentences.zh: 久之，荊軻未有行意。

translations.literal: Long time, Jing Ke not have go intention.
translations.idiomatic: After a long time, Jing Ke had no intention of going.

sentences.zh: 秦將王翦破趙，虜趙王，盡收入其地，進兵北略地至燕南界。

translations.literal: Qin general Wang Jian broke Zhao, captured Zhao king, completely took its land, advanced troops north plundered land to Yan south border.
translations.idiomatic: The Qin general Wang Jian broke Zhao, captured the Zhao king, and completely took its lands. He advanced troops north to plunder land up to Yan's southern border.

sentences.zh: 太子丹恐懼，乃請荊軻曰：「秦兵旦暮渡易水，則雖欲長侍足下，豈可得哉！」

translations.literal: Crown prince Dan feared, then requested Jing Ke said: 'Qin troops morning evening cross Yi Shui, then though want long serve you, how can get!'
translations.idiomatic: Prince Dan was fearful and requested Jing Ke, saying: 'Qin troops will cross the Yi River morning or evening. Then though I want to serve you for a long time, how can I obtain that!'

sentences.zh: 荊軻曰：「微太子言，臣願謁之。

translations.literal: Jing Ke said: 'Without crown prince speak, minister wish request it.
translations.idiomatic: Jing Ke said: 'Even without the crown prince speaking, I wish to request it.'

sentences.zh: 今行而毋信，則秦未可親也。

translations.literal: Now go yet no trust, then Qin not can approach.
translations.idiomatic: Now if I go without trust, then Qin cannot be approached.'

sentences.zh: 夫樊將軍，秦王購之金千斤，邑萬家。

translations.literal: That Fan general, Qin king reward gold thousand jin, fief ten thousand households.
translations.idiomatic: That General Fan - the Qin king offers a reward of a thousand jin of gold and a fief of ten thousand households for him.'

sentences.zh: 誠得樊將軍首與燕督亢之地圖，奉獻秦王，秦王必說見臣，臣乃得有以報。」

translations.literal: Truly get Fan general head with Yan Du Kang territory map, offer Qin king, Qin king must happy see minister, minister then can have to repay.'
translations.idiomatic: Truly getting General Fan's head and a map of Yan's Dukang territory to offer to the Qin king - the Qin king will certainly be happy and see me. I will then be able to repay.'

sentences.zh: 太子曰：「樊將軍窮困來歸丹，丹不忍以己之私而傷長者之意，願足下更慮之！」

translations.literal: Crown prince said: 'Fan general poor destitute come return Dan, Dan not endure with self private injure elder intention, wish you reconsider!'
translations.idiomatic: The crown prince said: 'General Fan came to me in poverty and destitution. I cannot endure injuring the intention of an elder with my own private matters. I wish you to reconsider!'

translations.literal: Long time, Jing Ke not had go intent. Qin general Wang Jian broke Zhao, captured Zhao king, completely took its land, advanced troops north seized land to Yan south border. Crown prince Dan feared, then requested Jing Ke: 'Qin troops morning evening cross Yi water, then though wish long serve you, how obtainable!' Jing Ke said: 'Without crown prince speak, minister wish see him. Now go yet no trust, then Qin not approachable. That Fan general, Qin king buys his head gold thousand jin, fief ten thousand households. Truly get Fan general head with Yan Du Kang land map, present Qin king, Qin king must pleased see minister, minister then can have to repay.' Crown prince said: 'Fan general poor distressed came submit Dan, Dan not bear with self private injure elder intention, wish you reconsider!'

sentences.zh: 荊軻知太子不忍，乃遂私見樊於期曰：「秦之遇將軍可謂深矣，父母宗族皆為戮沒。

translations.literal: Jing Ke knew crown prince not endure, then privately saw Fan Yu Qi said: 'Qin treat general can call deep, parents clan all executed exterminated.
translations.idiomatic: Jing Ke knew the crown prince could not endure it. He then privately saw Fan Yuqi and said: 'Qin's treatment of you, General, can be called deep. Your parents and clan have all been executed and exterminated.'

sentences.zh: 今聞購將軍首金千斤，邑萬家，將柰何？」

translations.literal: Now hear reward general head gold thousand jin, fief ten thousand households, will how?'
translations.idiomatic: Now I hear they offer a reward of a thousand jin of gold and a fief of ten thousand households for your head. What will you do?'

sentences.zh: 於期仰天太息流涕曰：「於期每念之，常痛於骨髓，顧計不知所出耳！」

translations.literal: Yu Qi looked heaven great sighed flowing tears said: 'Yu Qi every think it, often pain to bone marrow, but plan not know exit!'
translations.idiomatic: Yuqi looked up to heaven, greatly sighed, and flowed tears, saying: 'Yuqi thinks of it every time. It often pains me to the bone marrow. But I have no plan and do not know what to do!'

sentences.zh: 荊軻曰：「今有一言可以解燕國之患，報將軍之仇者，何如？」

translations.literal: Jing Ke said: 'Now have one word can solve Yan country calamity, repay general enmity, how?'
translations.idiomatic: Jing Ke said: 'Now there is one plan that can solve Yan's country's calamity and repay the general's enmity. How about it?'

sentences.zh: 於期乃前曰：「為之柰何？」

translations.literal: Yu Qi then front said: 'Do it how?'
translations.idiomatic: Yuqi then came forward and said: 'How to do it?'

sentences.zh: 荊軻曰：「願得將軍之首以獻秦王，秦王必喜而見臣，臣左手把其袖，右手揕其匈，然則將軍之仇報而燕見陵之愧除矣。

translations.literal: Jing Ke said: 'Wish get general head to offer Qin king, Qin king must happy see minister, minister left hand grasp his sleeve, right hand stab his chest, then general enmity repaid yet Yan insulted shame removed.
translations.idiomatic: Jing Ke said: 'I wish to get the general's head to offer to the Qin king. The Qin king will certainly be happy and see me. I will grasp his sleeve with my left hand and stab his chest with my right. Then the general's enmity will be repaid and Yan's shame from being insulted will be removed.'

sentences.zh: 將軍豈有意乎？」

translations.literal: General how have intention?'
translations.idiomatic: General, do you have the intention?'

sentences.zh: 樊於期偏袒搤捥而進曰：「此臣之日夜切齒腐心也，乃今得聞教！」

translations.literal: Fan Yu Qi bare shoulder wrung hands advanced said: 'This minister day night gnash teeth rot heart, now get hear teaching!'
translations.idiomatic: Fan Yuqi bared his shoulder, wrung his hands, and advanced, saying: 'This has been gnashing my teeth and rotting my heart day and night. Now I get to hear your teaching!'

sentences.zh: 遂自剄。

translations.literal: Then self cut throat.
translations.idiomatic: He then cut his own throat.

sentences.zh: 太子聞之，馳往，伏尸而哭，極哀。

translations.literal: Crown prince heard, galloped go, prostrated corpse cried, extremely sorrowful.
translations.idiomatic: The crown prince heard of it and galloped there. He prostrated himself on the corpse and cried extremely sorrowfully.

sentences.zh: 既已不可柰何，乃遂盛樊於期首函封之。

translations.literal: Already cannot how, then put Fan Yu Qi head in box seal.
translations.idiomatic: Since it could not be helped, he then put Fan Yuqi's head in a box and sealed it.

translations.literal: Jing Ke knew crown prince not bear, thus secretly saw Fan Yuji: 'Qin treated general can call deep, parents clan all executed exterminated. Now heard buy general head gold thousand jin, fief ten thousand households, will handle what?' Yuji faced heaven great sighed flowing tears: 'Yuji every think, often pained to bone marrow, but plan not know where out!' Jing Ke said: 'Now have one word can resolve Yan state suffering, repay general enmity, how?' Yuji then front: 'Do how?' Jing Ke said: 'Wish get general head to present Qin king, Qin king must pleased see minister, minister left hand grasp his sleeve, right hand stab his chest, then general enmity repaid Yan seen humiliate shame removed. General how intend?' Fan Yuji exposed shoulder choked cried advanced: 'This minister day night gnash teeth corrode heart, now get hear teaching!' Thus self-slit. Crown prince heard, galloped went, prostrated corpse cried, extreme sorrow. Already could not handle what, then placed Fan Yuji head in box sealed.

sentences.zh: 於是太子豫求天下之利匕首，得趙人徐夫人匕首，取之百金，使工以藥焠之，以試人，血濡縷，人無不立死者。

translations.literal: Then crown prince early sought world sharp dagger, got Zhao person Xu lady dagger, took hundred gold, made artisan with drug temper it, to test person, blood wet thread, none not immediately die.
translations.idiomatic: The crown prince then early sought the world's sharpest dagger. He got a dagger from Lady Xu of Zhao, paying a hundred pieces of gold for it. He had an artisan temper it with drugs. When tested on people, blood wetted the thread, and no one did not die immediately.

sentences.zh: 乃裝為遣荊卿。

translations.literal: Then prepared to send Jing Qing.
translations.idiomatic: He then prepared to send Jing Qing.

sentences.zh: 燕國有勇士秦舞陽，年十三，殺人，人不敢忤視。

translations.literal: Yan country had brave man Qin Wu Yang, age thirteen, killed person, people not dare directly look.
translations.idiomatic: Yan had a brave man named Qin Wuyang, thirteen years old, who had killed people. People did not dare to look at him directly.

sentences.zh: 乃令秦舞陽為副。

translations.literal: Then made Qin Wu Yang be deputy.
translations.idiomatic: He then made Qin Wuyang his deputy.

sentences.zh: 荊軻有所待，欲與俱；

translations.literal: Jing Ke had what wait, wanted with go together;
translations.idiomatic: Jing Ke had someone he was waiting for, whom he wanted to go with;

sentences.zh: 其人居遠未來，而為治行。

translations.literal: That person lived far not come, yet prepared journey.
translations.idiomatic: that person lived far away and had not come. Yet he prepared for the journey.

sentences.zh: 頃之，未發，太子遲之，疑其改悔，乃復請曰：「日已盡矣，荊卿豈有意哉？

translations.literal: Moment, not yet sent, crown prince delayed it, suspected changed intention, then again requested said: 'Day already exhausted, Jing Qing how have intention?
translations.idiomatic: After a moment, not yet sent, the crown prince grew impatient with it and suspected he had changed his intention. He then again requested: 'The day is already exhausted. Does Jing Qing have the intention?'

sentences.zh: 丹請得先遣秦舞陽。」

translations.literal: Dan please first send Qin Wu Yang.'
translations.idiomatic: I, Dan, request to first send Qin Wuyang.'

sentences.zh: 荊軻怒，叱太子曰：「何太子之遣？

translations.literal: Jing Ke angry, scolded crown prince said: 'What crown prince send?
translations.idiomatic: Jing Ke became angry and scolded the crown prince, saying: 'What is this sending by the crown prince?'

sentences.zh: 往而不返者，豎子也！

translations.literal: Go not return, young boy!'
translations.idiomatic: To go and not return - that is the way of a young boy!'

sentences.zh: 且提一匕首入不測之彊秦，仆所以留者，待吾客與俱。

translations.literal: Moreover carry one dagger enter immeasurable strong Qin, I what stay, wait my guest with go.
translations.idiomatic: Moreover, carrying one dagger into the immeasurable strong Qin - the reason I stay is to wait for my guest to go with me.'

sentences.zh: 今太子遲之，請辭決矣！」

translations.literal: Now crown prince delays it, please bid farewell decide!'
translations.idiomatic: Now the crown prince is delaying it. Please allow me to bid farewell and be decisive!'

sentences.zh: 遂發。

translations.literal: Then sent.
translations.idiomatic: They then departed.

translations.literal: Thus crown prince beforehand sought world sharp dagger, got Zhao person Xu lady dagger, bought hundred jin gold, made artisan with medicine temper, tested on person, blood wet thread, person none not immediately died. Then prepared send Jing Qing. Yan state had brave warrior Qin Wuyang, age thirteen, killed person, people dared not offend look. Thus commanded Qin Wuyang as deputy. Jing Ke had waited person, wished with go; That person dwelt far not come, yet prepared journey. Moment, not issued, crown prince delayed him, suspected his change regret, then requested: 'Day already exhausted, Jing Qing how intend? Dan please get first send Qin Wuyang.' Jing Ke angered, scolded crown prince: 'What crown prince send? Go not return, boy child! Moreover carry one dagger enter immeasurable strong Qin, servant so stay, wait my guest with go. Now crown prince delays, please leave decided!' Thus issued.

sentences.zh: 太子及賓客知其事者，皆白衣冠以送之。

translations.literal: Crown prince and guests knew matter, all white clothes caps to send him.
translations.idiomatic: The crown prince and the guests who knew the matter all wore white clothes and caps to send him off.

sentences.zh: 至易水之上，既祖，取道，高漸離擊筑，荊軻和而歌，為變徵之聲，士皆垂淚涕泣。

translations.literal: To Yi Shui above, already sacrificed road, took road, Gao Jian Li struck zhu, Jing Ke harmonized sang, made change zhi sound, scholars all hung tears wept.
translations.idiomatic: They reached the Yi River. After the road sacrifice, they took the road. Gao Jianli struck the zhu, Jing Ke harmonized and sang in the bianzhi mode. All the scholars hung tears and wept.

sentences.zh: 又前而為歌曰：「風蕭蕭兮易水寒，壯士一去兮不復還！」

translations.literal: Again forward sang: 'Wind bleak bleak Yi Shui cold, brave man one go not return!'
translations.idiomatic: He again went forward and sang: 'The wind howls bleakly, the Yi waters are cold; the brave man goes once and does not return!'

sentences.zh: 復為羽聲慨，士皆瞋目，發盡上指冠。

translations.literal: Again made feather sound lofty, scholars all glared eyes, hair all pointed up hats.
translations.idiomatic: He again sang in the yu mode with lofty spirit. All the scholars glared with their eyes, their hair stood on end and pushed up their caps.

sentences.zh: 於是荊軻就車而去，終已不顧。

translations.literal: Then Jing Ke boarded carriage left, finally not looked back.
translations.idiomatic: Jing Ke then boarded the carriage and left. In the end he did not look back.

translations.literal: Crown prince and guests knew affair, all white clothes hats to send him. Reached Yi water above, already sacrificed, took road, Gao Jianli beat zhu, Jing Ke harmonized sang, made change zhi sound, scholars all hung tears wept. Again front made song: 'Wind soughs Yi water cold, brave man one go not return!' Again made yu sound lofty, scholars all stared eyes, hair all up pointed caps. Thus Jing Ke approached carriage departed, end not look back.

sentences.zh: 遂至秦，持千金之資幣物，厚遺秦王寵臣中庶子蒙嘉。

translations.literal: Then to Qin, held thousand gold resources gifts, thick gave Qin king favored minister middle grand master Meng Jia.
translations.idiomatic: He then went to Qin, holding a thousand pieces of gold in resources and gifts. He generously gave them to the Qin king's favored minister, the middle grand master Meng Jia.

sentences.zh: 嘉為先言於秦王曰：「燕王誠振怖大王之威，不敢舉兵以逆軍吏，願舉國為內臣，比諸侯之列，給貢職如郡縣，而得奉守先王之宗廟。

translations.literal: Jia first spoke to Qin king said: 'Yan king truly terrified great king might, not dare raise troops to oppose army officials, wish whole country become inner minister, compare lords ranks, give tribute duty like commandery county, able keep guard former king ancestral temple.
translations.idiomatic: Jia first spoke to the Qin king, saying: 'The Yan king is truly terrified by your majesty's might. He does not dare raise troops to oppose the army officials. He wishes the whole country to become inner ministers, ranked among the lords, giving tribute and duties like a commandery or county, and thus able to keep and guard the former king's ancestral temple.'

sentences.zh: 恐懼不敢自陳，謹斬樊於期之頭，及獻燕督亢之地圖，函封，燕王拜送于庭，使使以聞大王，唯大王命之。」

translations.literal: Feared not dare self state, respectfully cut Fan Yu Qi head, and offer Yan Du Kang territory map, box sealed, Yan king bowed sent at court, made envoy announce great king, only great king command.'
translations.idiomatic: Out of fear he does not dare state it himself. He respectfully cuts Fan Yuqi's head and offers a map of Yan's Dukang territory, sealed in a box. The Yan king bows and sends it from the court, having envoys announce it to your majesty. Only your majesty commands it.'

sentences.zh: 秦王聞之，大喜，乃朝服，設九賓，見燕使者咸陽宮。

translations.literal: Qin king heard, greatly happy, then court robes, set nine guests, saw Yan envoy Xianyang palace.
translations.idiomatic: The Qin king heard this and was greatly happy. He then donned court robes, set up the nine guests ceremony, and saw the Yan envoy in the Xianyang palace.

sentences.zh: 荊軻奉樊於期頭函，而秦舞陽奉地圖柙，以次進。

translations.literal: Jing Ke offered Fan Yu Qi head box, Qin Wu Yang offered territory map case, in order advanced.
translations.idiomatic: Jing Ke presented Fan Yuqi's head in a box, while Qin Wuyang presented the territory map in a case. They advanced in order.

sentences.zh: 至陛，秦舞陽色變振恐，群臣怪之。

translations.literal: To steps, Qin Wu Yang color changed trembled feared, ministers strange it.
translations.idiomatic: When they reached the steps, Qin Wuyang's color changed and he trembled in fear. The ministers thought it strange.

sentences.zh: 荊軻顧笑舞陽，前謝曰：「北蕃蠻夷之鄙人，未嘗見天子，故振慴。

translations.literal: Jing Ke looked back smiled Wu Yang, front apologized said: 'North barbarian barbarian rustic person, not once seen emperor, therefore trembled feared.
translations.idiomatic: Jing Ke looked back and smiled at Wuyang, then apologized in front, saying: 'A rustic person from the northern barbarian tribes, who has never seen the Son of Heaven, therefore trembles in fear.'

sentences.zh: 願大王少假借之，使得畢使於前。」

translations.literal: Wish great king little lend it, make able finish mission at front.'
translations.idiomatic: I wish your majesty to lend him a little consideration, so he can finish his mission at the front.'

sentences.zh: 秦王謂軻曰：「取舞陽所持地圖。」

translations.literal: Qin king told Ke said: 'Take Wu Yang held territory map.'
translations.idiomatic: The Qin king told Ke: 'Take the territory map that Wuyang holds.'

sentences.zh: 軻既取圖奏之，秦王發圖，圖窮而匕首見。

translations.literal: Ke already took map presented it, Qin king unrolled map, map exhausted dagger appeared.
translations.idiomatic: Ke took the map and presented it. The Qin king unrolled the map. When the map was exhausted, the dagger appeared.

sentences.zh: 因左手把秦王之袖，而右手持匕首揕之。

translations.literal: Because left hand grasped Qin king sleeve, right hand held dagger stabbed him.
translations.idiomatic: He grasped the Qin king's sleeve with his left hand while holding the dagger to stab him with his right.

sentences.zh: 未至身，秦王驚，自引而起，袖絕。

translations.literal: Not yet to body, Qin king startled, self pulled rose, sleeve tore.
translations.idiomatic: It had not yet reached his body when the Qin king was startled. He pulled himself up and the sleeve tore.

sentences.zh: 拔劍，劍長，操其室。

translations.literal: Drew sword, sword long, gripped its sheath.
translations.idiomatic: He drew his sword. The sword was long and he gripped its sheath.

sentences.zh: 時惶急，劍堅，故不可立拔。

translations.literal: At time flustered urgent, sword firm, therefore could not immediately draw.
translations.idiomatic: At this flustered and urgent time, the sword was firm, so he could not immediately draw it.

sentences.zh: 荊軻逐秦王，秦王環柱而走。

translations.literal: Jing Ke pursued Qin king, Qin king circled pillar walked.
translations.idiomatic: Jing Ke pursued the Qin king. The Qin king circled a pillar and ran.

sentences.zh: 群臣皆愕，卒起不意，盡失其度。

translations.literal: Ministers all astonished, suddenly rose not expected, all lost their measure.
translations.idiomatic: All the ministers were astonished. They suddenly rose unexpectedly and all lost their composure.

sentences.zh: 而秦法，群臣侍殿上者不得持尺寸之兵；

translations.literal: Yet Qin law, ministers served hall above not allowed hold inch weapons;
translations.idiomatic: Yet by Qin law, ministers serving in the hall above were not allowed to hold weapons of any size;

sentences.zh: 諸郎中執兵皆陳殿下，非有詔召不得上。

translations.literal: Various chamberlains held weapons all arrayed hall below, not have imperial command summon not allowed ascend.
translations.idiomatic: all the various chamberlains holding weapons were arrayed below the hall. Without an imperial command summoning them, they were not allowed to ascend.

sentences.zh: 方急時，不及召下兵，以故荊軻乃逐秦王。

translations.literal: At urgent time, not time summon lower troops, because Jing Ke then pursued Qin king.
translations.idiomatic: At this urgent time, there was no time to summon the lower troops. Because of this, Jing Ke pursued the Qin king.

sentences.zh: 而卒惶急，無以擊軻，而以手共搏之。

translations.literal: Yet suddenly flustered urgent, no way strike Ke, with hands together wrestled him.
translations.idiomatic: Yet the ministers were suddenly flustered and urgent, with no way to strike Ke, so they wrestled him with their hands together.

sentences.zh: 是時侍醫夏無且以其所奉藥囊提荊軻也。

translations.literal: At this time attending physician Xia Wu Ju with his held medicine bag struck Jing Ke.
translations.idiomatic: At this time, the attending physician Xia Wuju struck Jing Ke with the medicine bag he held.

sentences.zh: 秦王方環柱走，卒惶急，不知所為，左右乃曰：「王負劍！」

translations.literal: Qin king just circling pillar walking, suddenly flustered urgent, not know what do, left right then said: 'King wear sword!'
translations.idiomatic: The Qin king was just circling the pillar and running. The ministers were suddenly flustered and urgent, not knowing what to do. The left and right then said: 'Your majesty, wear your sword!'

sentences.zh: 負劍，遂拔以擊荊軻，斷其左股。

translations.literal: Wore sword, then drew to strike Jing Ke, cut his left thigh.
translations.idiomatic: He wore the sword, then drew it to strike Jing Ke, cutting his left thigh.

sentences.zh: 荊軻廢，乃引其匕首以擿秦王，不中，中桐柱。

translations.literal: Jing Ke crippled, then drew his dagger to throw at Qin king, not hit, hit paulownia pillar.
translations.idiomatic: Jing Ke was crippled. He then drew his dagger to throw at the Qin king. It did not hit but struck the paulownia pillar.

sentences.zh: 秦王復擊軻，軻被八創。

translations.literal: Qin king again struck Ke, Ke received eight wounds.
translations.idiomatic: The Qin king struck Ke again. Ke received eight wounds.

sentences.zh: 軻自知事不就，倚柱而笑，箕踞以罵曰：「事所以不成者，以欲生劫之，必得約契以報太子也。」

translations.literal: Ke self knew matter not succeed, leaned pillar laughed, sat cross-legged cursed said: 'Matter why not succeed, because wanted alive hijack him, must get treaty contract to repay crown prince.'
translations.idiomatic: Ke knew the matter would not succeed. He leaned against the pillar and laughed, sitting cross-legged as he cursed: 'The reason the matter did not succeed was because I wanted to hijack him alive. I must get a treaty contract to repay the crown prince.'

sentences.zh: 於是左右既前殺軻，秦王不怡者良久。

translations.literal: Then left right already advanced killed Ke, Qin king not pleased for good long time.
translations.idiomatic: The left and right then advanced and killed Ke. The Qin king was displeased for a good long time.

sentences.zh: 已而論功，賞群臣及當坐者各有差，而賜夏無且黃金二百溢，曰：「無且愛我，乃以藥囊提荊軻也。」

translations.literal: After discussed merit, rewarded ministers and those should sit each had difference, granted Xia Wu Ju yellow gold two hundred yi, said: 'Wu Ju loves me, used medicine bag struck Jing Ke.'
translations.idiomatic: After this, merits were discussed and rewards given to the ministers and those who should sit, each with differences. Xia Wuju was granted two hundred yi of yellow gold, saying: 'Wuju loves me. He used his medicine bag to strike Jing Ke.'

translations.literal: Thus reached Qin, held thousand jin gift currency objects, thick presented Qin king favored minister middle minister Zi Meng Jia. Jia for first spoke Qin king: 'Yan king truly shaken terrified great king's might, not dare raise troops to oppose army officials, wish whole state become inner minister, compare feudal lords ranks, give tribute duty like commandery county, able maintain guard former king ancestral temple. Fear not dare self-state, respectfully behead Fan Yuji head, and offer Yan Du Kang land map, box sealed, Yan king bowed sent at court, made envoy to hear great king, only great king command.' Qin king heard, greatly pleased, court robes, set nine guests, saw Yan envoy Xianyang palace. Jing Ke presented Fan Yuji head box, Qin Wuyang presented land map case, by order advanced. Reached stairs, Qin Wuyang color changed trembled feared, ministers strange it. Jing Ke looked back laughed Wuyang, front apologized: 'North barbarian uncivilized rustic person, not tasted see emperor, thus tremble frightened. Wish great king little lenient, make him complete mission at front.' Qin king told Ke: 'Take Wuyang held land map.' Ke having taken map presented, Qin king unrolled map, map exhausted dagger appeared. Thus left hand grasped Qin king sleeve, right hand held dagger stabbed him. Not reached body, Qin king startled, self pulled rose, sleeve broke. Drew sword, sword long, gripped its scabbard. Time panicked urgent, sword firm, thus not could immediately draw. Jing Ke pursued Qin king, Qin king circled pillar walked. Ministers all astonished, suddenly rose unexpected, all lost their measure. Qin law, ministers served hall above not permitted hold inch weapons; Various langzhong held weapons all arrayed hall below, not have decree summon not could ascend. When urgent time, not reached summon below troops, thus Jing Ke pursued Qin king. Yet finally panicked urgent, no with strike Ke, with hands together fought him. At time attending physician Xia Wuqian with his carried medicine bag struck Jing Ke. Qin king just circled pillar walked, finally panicked urgent, not knew what do, left right then said: 'King carry sword!' Carry sword, then drew to strike Jing Ke, severed his left thigh. Jing Ke crippled, then drew his dagger to throw Qin king, not hit, hit paulownia pillar. Qin king again struck Ke, Ke suffered eight wounds. Ke self knew affair not succeed, leaned pillar laughed, sat cross-legged cursed: 'Affair so not complete, because wished alive kidnap him, must get treaty to repay crown prince.' Thus left right having front killed Ke, Qin king not pleased long time. Already then discussed merit, rewarded ministers and should sit each different, granted Xia Wuqian yellow gold two hundred yi, said: 'Wuqian loved me, thus with medicine bag struck Jing Ke.'

sentences.zh: 於是秦王大怒，益發兵詣趙，詔王翦軍以伐燕。

translations.literal: Then Qin king greatly angry, increased sent troops to Zhao, commanded Wang Jian army to attack Yan.
translations.idiomatic: The Qin king was greatly angered. He increased the troops sent to Zhao and commanded Wang Jian's army to attack Yan.

sentences.zh: 十月而拔薊城。

translations.literal: Tenth month took Ji city.
translations.idiomatic: In the tenth month, they took Ji city.

sentences.zh: 燕王喜、太子丹等盡率其精兵東保於遼東。

translations.literal: Yan king Xi, crown prince Dan etc all led their elite troops east defended at Liaodong.
translations.idiomatic: Yan king Xi and crown prince Dan led all their elite troops to defend eastward at Liaodong.

sentences.zh: 秦將李信追擊燕王急，代王嘉乃遺燕王喜書曰：「秦所以尤追燕急者，以太子丹故也。

translations.literal: Qin general Li Xin pursued Yan king urgent, Dai king Jia then sent Yan king Xi letter said: 'Qin why especially pursue Yan urgent, because crown prince Dan reason.
translations.idiomatic: The Qin general Li Xin pursued Yan king Xi urgently. Dai king Jia sent Yan king Xi a letter saying: 'The reason Qin especially pursues Yan urgently is because of crown prince Dan.'

sentences.zh: 今王誠殺丹獻之秦王，秦王必解，而社稷幸得血食。」

translations.literal: Now king truly kill Dan offer Qin king, Qin king must relieve, state altars luckily get blood sacrifices.'
translations.idiomatic: If your majesty truly kills Dan and offers him to the Qin king, the Qin king will certainly relieve us, and the state's altars will luckily receive blood sacrifices.'

sentences.zh: 其後李信追丹，丹匿衍水中，燕王乃使使斬太子丹，欲獻之秦。

translations.literal: After Li Xin pursued Dan, Dan hid Yan water middle, Yan king then made envoy cut crown prince Dan, wanted offer Qin.
translations.idiomatic: After this, Li Xin pursued Dan. Dan hid in the middle of Yan water. The Yan king had envoys cut down crown prince Dan, wanting to offer him to Qin.

sentences.zh: 秦復進兵攻之。

translations.literal: Qin again advanced troops attacked them.
translations.idiomatic: Qin again advanced troops to attack them.

sentences.zh: 後五年，秦卒滅燕，虜燕王喜。

translations.literal: After five years, Qin finally exterminated Yan, captured Yan king Xi.
translations.idiomatic: Five years later, Qin finally exterminated Yan and captured Yan king Xi.

translations.literal: Thus Qin king greatly angered, increased sent troops to Zhao, commanded Wang Jian army to attack Yan. Tenth month then captured Ji city. Yan king Xi, crown prince Dan etc. completely led their elite troops east defended at Liaodong. Qin general Li Xin pursued Yan king urgent, Dai king Jia then sent Yan king Xi letter: 'Qin so especially pursued Yan urgent, because crown prince Dan. Now king truly kill Dan offer Qin king, Qin king must relieve, state altars fortunately get blood food.' Afterward Li Xin pursued Dan, Dan hid Yan water, Yan king then made envoy behead crown prince Dan, wished offer Qin. Qin again advanced troops attacked. After five years, Qin finally extinguished Yan, captured Yan king Xi.

sentences.zh: 其明年，秦并天下，立號為皇帝。

translations.literal: Next year, Qin united world, established title emperor.
translations.idiomatic: The next year, Qin united the world and established the title of emperor.

sentences.zh: 於是秦逐太子丹、荊軻之客，皆亡。

translations.literal: Then Qin pursued crown prince Dan, Jing Ke guests, all fled.
translations.idiomatic: Qin then pursued the guests of crown prince Dan and Jing Ke. They all fled.

sentences.zh: 高漸離變名姓為人庸保，匿作於宋子。

translations.literal: Gao Jianli changed name surname as common laborer, hid worked at Songzi.
translations.idiomatic: Gao Jianli changed his name and surname to become a common laborer and hid working at Songzi's place.

sentences.zh: 久之，作苦，聞其家堂上客擊筑，傍偟不能去。

translations.literal: Long time, work bitter, heard his family hall guest struck zhu, lingered could not leave.
translations.idiomatic: After a long time, the work was bitter. He heard a guest in his family's hall striking the zhu and lingered, unable to leave.

sentences.zh: 每出言曰：「彼有善有不善。」

translations.literal: Every time spoke said: 'That has good has not good.'
translations.idiomatic: Every time he spoke, saying: 'That has good and not good.'

sentences.zh: 從者以告其主，曰：「彼庸乃知音，竊言是非。」

translations.literal: Followers told his master, said: 'That laborer is connoisseur, secretly comments right wrong.'
translations.idiomatic: The followers told their master, saying: 'That laborer is a connoisseur. He secretly comments on right and wrong.'

sentences.zh: 家丈人召使前擊筑，一坐稱善，賜酒。

translations.literal: Family elder summoned made front strike zhu, full seat praised good, granted wine.
translations.idiomatic: The family elder summoned him to come forward and strike the zhu. The full seat praised it as good and granted wine.

sentences.zh: 而高漸離念久隱畏約無窮時，乃退，出其裝匣中筑與其善衣，更容貌而前。

translations.literal: Gao Jianli thought long hidden feared covenant endless time, then retreated, took out his case zhu and good clothes, changed appearance front.
translations.idiomatic: Gao Jianli thought of his long hiding and feared the covenant would have no end. He then retreated, took out his zhu from the case along with his good clothes, changed his appearance, and came forward.

sentences.zh: 舉坐客皆驚，下與抗禮，以為上客。

translations.literal: Full seat guests all astonished, descended gave equal ritual, treated as upper guest.
translations.idiomatic: All the seated guests were astonished. They descended and gave him equal ritual, treating him as an upper guest.

sentences.zh: 使擊筑而歌，客無不流涕而去者。

translations.literal: Made strike zhu sing, guests none not flowed tears left.
translations.idiomatic: He was made to strike the zhu and sing. There were no guests who did not flow tears and leave.

sentences.zh: 宋子傳客之，聞於秦始皇。

translations.literal: Songzi transmitted guests to him, heard Qin Shi Huang.
translations.idiomatic: Songzi transmitted guests to him. It was heard by Qin Shi Huang.

sentences.zh: 秦始皇召見，人有識者，乃曰：「高漸離也。」

translations.literal: Qin Shi Huang summoned saw, person had recognizing, said: 'Gao Jianli.'
translations.idiomatic: Qin Shi Huang summoned him to be seen. There was someone who recognized him and said: 'This is Gao Jianli.'

sentences.zh: 秦皇帝惜其善擊筑，重赦之，乃矐其目。

translations.literal: Qin emperor pitied his good strike zhu, heavily pardoned him, then blinded his eyes.
translations.idiomatic: The Qin emperor pitied his skill at striking the zhu and heavily pardoned him. He then blinded his eyes.

sentences.zh: 使擊筑，未嘗不稱善。

translations.literal: Made strike zhu, never not praised good.
translations.idiomatic: He was made to strike the zhu. It was never not praised as good.

sentences.zh: 稍益近之，高漸離乃以鉛置筑中，復進得近，舉筑樸秦皇帝，不中。

translations.literal: Gradually more approached him, Gao Jianli then put lead in zhu middle, again advanced got near, raised zhu struck Qin emperor, not hit.
translations.idiomatic: He was gradually brought nearer. Gao Jianli then put lead in the zhu. He again advanced and got near, raised the zhu and struck the Qin emperor. It did not hit.

sentences.zh: 於是遂誅高漸離，終身不復近諸侯之人。

translations.literal: Then executed Gao Jianli, lifetime not again approached lords people.
translations.idiomatic: He was then executed, Gao Jianli. For his lifetime he did not again approach the people of lords.

translations.literal: Its next year, Qin united world, established title emperor. Thus Qin pursued crown prince Dan, Jing Ke guests, all fled. Gao Jianli changed name surname became person menial servant, hid worked at Song Zi. Long time, work bitter, heard his family hall guest beat zhu, eavesdropped could not leave. Every exit spoke: 'That has good has not good.' Followers told his master, said: 'That menial actually knows sound, secretly speaks right wrong.' Family elder summoned made front beat zhu, one seat praised good, granted wine. Gao Jianli thought long hidden feared restraint no end time, then retreated, exited his outfit box zhu with his good clothes, changed appearance front. Whole seat guests all startled, descended with equal ritual, considered upper guest. Made beat zhu sang, guests none not flowing tears departed. Song Zi transmitted guests, heard by Qin Shi Huang. Qin Shi Huang summoned saw, person had recognized, then said: 'Gao Jianli.' Qin emperor cherished his good beat zhu, heavy pardoned him, then blinded his eyes. Made beat zhu, not tasted not praised good. Gradually increased close him, Gao Jianli then with lead placed zhu middle, again advanced got close, raised zhu struck Qin emperor, not hit. Thus then executed Gao Jianli, lifetime not again approached feudal lord persons.

sentences.zh: 魯句踐已聞荊軻之刺秦王，私曰：「嗟乎，惜哉其不講於刺劍之術也！

translations.literal: Lu Goujian already heard Jing Ke stabbed Qin king, privately said: 'Alas, pity he not studied stabbing sword technique!'
translations.idiomatic: Lu Goujian had already heard of Jing Ke's stabbing of the Qin king. He privately said: 'Alas, what a pity he did not study the technique of stabbing swords!'

sentences.zh: 甚矣吾不知人也！

translations.literal: Very I not know people!
translations.idiomatic: How very I do not know people!

sentences.zh: 曩者吾叱之，彼乃以我為非人也！」

translations.literal: Formerly I scolded him, he then took me as not person!'
translations.idiomatic: Formerly I scolded him, yet he took me as a non-person!'

translations.literal: Lu Goujian already heard Jing Ke stabbed Qin king, privately said: 'Alas, pity his not practiced sword stabbing technique! Extreme my not know person! Previously I scolded him, he then considered me not person!'

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：世言荊軻，其稱太子丹之命，「天雨粟，馬生角」也，太過。

translations.literal: Grand Historian said: World speaks Jing Ke, what calls crown prince Dan fate, 'heaven rains grain, horse grows horn', too excessive.
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Historian said: The world speaks of Jing Ke and calls Crown Prince Dan's fate 'heaven rains grain, horse grows horn' - it is too excessive.

sentences.zh: 又言荊軻傷秦王，皆非也。

translations.literal: Again speaks Jing Ke injured Qin king, all not so.
translations.idiomatic: Again, it speaks of Jing Ke injuring the Qin king - all are not so.

sentences.zh: 始公孫季功、董生與夏無且游，具知其事，為余道之如是。

translations.literal: Beginning Gongsun Ji Gong, Dong Sheng with Xia Wu Ju traveled, fully knew its matter, for me told like this.
translations.idiomatic: Beginning with Gongsun Jigong and Dong Sheng traveling with Xia Wuju, they fully knew the matter and told it to me like this.

sentences.zh: 自曹沫至荊軻五人，此其義或成或不成，然其立意較然，不欺其志，名垂後世，豈妄也哉！

translations.literal: From Cao Mo to Jing Ke five people, this their righteousness or succeeded or not succeeded, yet their established intention clear bright, not deceived their will, name hangs later generations, how false!
translations.idiomatic: From Cao Mo to Jing Ke, five people - their righteousness either succeeded or did not succeed, yet their established intentions were clear and bright. They did not deceive their wills. Their names hang in later generations. How could this be false!

translations.literal: Grand Historian said: World speaks Jing Ke, its praises crown prince Dan fate, 'heaven rained grain, horse grew horns', too excessive. Again speaks Jing Ke injured Qin king, all not so. Beginning Gong Sun Ji Gong, Dong Sheng with Xia Wuqian traveled, fully knew affairs, for me told as this. From Cao Mo to Jing Ke five persons, this their righteousness or completed or not completed, yet their established intent clearly bright, not deceived their will, name hung later generations, how false!
